zh: 新华时评把优秀返乡农民工打造成乡村振兴，沈立军，新华网。
en: Xinhua Commentary: Outstanding returning rural migrant workers can be a rural revitalization army - Xinhuanet

zh: 乡村振兴人才是关键。
en: Talent is the key to rural revitalization.

zh: 人才哪里找？
en: Where is talent found?

zh: 优秀返乡农民工群体是不可或缺的生力军。
en: Outstanding returning rural migrant workers are an indispensable force in the fight.

zh: 新华社成都7月26日电梯把优秀返乡农民工打造成乡村振兴沈丽君。
en: Xinhua News Agency, reported July 26th Headline: Outstanding returning rural migrant workers can be a force for rural revitalization - Xinhuanet

zh: 今年34岁的张雄家在四川眉山市果园村，2010年他辞掉北京，月薪上万的工作，返乡创业。
en: Zhang Xiong, age 34, is a resident of Guoyuan Village in Meishan City, Sichuan Province who quit his job with a salary over 10,000 yuan in Beijing and returned to his hometown to start a business in 2010.

zh: 经过几年打拼，如今她经营的葡萄种植家庭农场，年收入超过百万元，成为小有名气的致富带头人，还被选拔进入村两委班子。
en: After a few years of effort, his family’s vinery now earns an annual income of over a million yuan, he has gained a small amount of fame for being a wealth creator, and he has also been selected as a member of the village’s “Two Committees”.

zh: 近年来在国家脱贫攻坚，乡村振兴等一系列支农惠农政策激励感召下，越来越多像长兄一样的优秀农民工，选择返乡创业，激活了乡村一池春水。
en: In recent years, national policies to alleviate poverty, revitalize rural areas, and benefit farmers and agriculture have inspired an increasing number of people outstanding migrant workers like Zhang Xiong to return to their hometowns to start their own businesses, which has become a new source of growth for rural areas.

zh: 我国西部人口大省，劳务输出大省四川因势利导实施优秀农民工会，因培养工程2019年就从婚姻的优秀农民工中产生村党支部书记8000余名，培育村后备力量6.1万名，发展党员2万余名，为打赢脱贫攻坚战和实施乡村振兴战略提供有力保证。
en: Sichuan is a western Chinese province with a large population and that produces high labor outflows, but thanks to the province’s “Outstanding Rural Migrant Worker Return Incentives and Cultivation Project”, in 2019 alone, the program has produced more than 8,000 village party branch secretaries from returned outstanding rural migrant workers, brought back and cultivated a labor force of 61,000 for villages, and produced over 20,000 new Party members, creating a powerful guarantee in the fight to eliminate poverty and implement rural revitalization strategies.

zh: 小康不小康，关键看老乡。
en: Hometowns are the key to moderate prosperity.

zh: 改革开放以来，我国农村大量青壮年劳动力外出务工增收，有的通过打拼创办了自己的企业。
en: Since reform and opening up, huge numbers of young in China have left rural villages to seek work elsewhere, and some, through their own hard work, have managed to start their own companies.

zh: 但客观上也导致农村空心化不同程度的出现，特别是农村基层组织弱化，村党支部书记和党员队伍均呈现出以lead特征及年龄老化学历偏低，村党组织带头人队伍不强，青黄不接问题突出。
en: But objectively speaking, to varying degrees, it has also led to the “hollowing out” of Chinese villages, especially those where grassroots organizations are weak, and led to the “aging and lowering” phenomenon among village Party branch secretaries and cadres, in which these groups are both getting older and have lower educational attainment, leading to disinterest among young people in continuing the work of village Party organizations with weak leadership.

zh: 如果乡村人才等要素一直单向流往城市，乡村长期处于失血贫血，状态振兴就是一句空话。
en: If rural talent and other assets only flow in one direction, to the cities, in the long term this leads to “loss of blood” and “anemia” in rural areas, in turn making “revitalization” an empty slogan.

zh: 把那些有能力有觉悟，有志于为家乡服务的农民工吸引会，引导他们返乡创业，成为致富带头人，从中择优培养成党员，乡村干部充实基层干部队伍，这是解决农村党员队伍和基层党组织青黄不接的治本之策。
en: Attracting back migrant workers who are capable, conscientious, and determined to serve their hometowns, incentivizing them to return there to start businesses and become wealth creators, and then cultivating them as Party members and rural cadres to enrich the ranks of grassroots cadres is a permanent solution to the problem of young people not continuing the work of rural Party corps and grassroots Party organizations.

zh: 优秀农民工赢得会还要让他们留得住干得好。
en: Once outstanding rural migrant workers return, they also must be convinced to stay and do good work.

zh: 近年类似车从狠抓农民工党建入手，在严格人选标准的基础上，建立优秀农民工定向婚姻服务保障，培训，体能选拔使用等制度机制，让他们在能力上有提升，工作上有保障，生活上有盼头，真正在农村扎下根，干事创业有成就感。
en: In recent years, Sichuan has focused more on Party-building among rural migrant workers, and on the basis of strict selection requirements, has established systems and mechanisms such as directed incentives for outstanding rural migrant workers to return, service guarantees, training and promotion, and selection and use which ensure they will gain from their effort, receive guarantees in their work, have things to look forward to in life, truly put down roots in the village, and feel a sense of accomplishment in their work and entrepreneurship.

zh: 今年是决战脱贫攻坚的收官之年，做好脱贫攻坚与乡村振兴的衔接人才是关键因素。
en: This is the final year of the battle to decisively end poverty, and talent is the key factor to establish the connection between poverty alleviation and rural revitalization.

zh: 各级党委政府要高度重视优秀返乡农民工这一群体，通过综合措施，把他们打造成一支留得住，能战斗带不走的工作队，生力军，为农村脱贫奔小康和发展振兴提供强有力的组织保障和人才支撑。
en: Party committees and governments at every level should prioritize rural migrant workers who return to their hometowns, and should use comprehensive measures to form them into a work corps and army that is willing to stay, capable of contributing, and unwilling to leave, so that they can serve as a powerful organizational guarantee and talent pool that supports rural poverty elimination and prosperity building efforts, as well as rural development and revitalization.

zh: 因为遭遇疫情，今年的大学毕业生是很特殊的一届，7月11日外文夏日碧叶革会为毕业生们带来一场特殊的线上直播演出，老郎村毛不易等音乐人为应届毕业生送上歌声和祝福。
en: Thanks to the pandemic, this year’s university graduates are a very special class: On the evening of July 11th, the “Bilibili Summer Graduation Songs” offered up a special online show for new graduates with performances from musicians such as Lao Lang, Pu Shu, Li Yuchun, and Mao Buyi to give graduates a sendoff of music and good wishes.

zh: 知名英文猪英文吴亦凡还带来了一首野草，这是他根据鲁迅的同名散文事迹改编创作的说唱风歌曲在年轻人中极受欢迎。
en: The famous host of Up, Seal Wu, performed his song “Wild Grass”, a rap song based on Lu Xun’s poem of the same name, which is very popular with young people.

zh: 由于疫情的关系，不少毕业生没能体会现场8岁授学位证的仪式感，他们就把一事给转移到了线上。
en: Because of the pandemic, many graduates will not be able to enjoy the sounds and sights of receiving their diploma in person, so they moved the ritual and all of its sensations online.

zh: 数据显示这场时长2.5小时的歌会直播，人气峰值超过3,500万。
en: Statistics show that peak viewership of the 2.5 hour special event exceeded 35 million.

zh: 遵循自己的内心吧，把握住机会不计较后果，有时反而会有意想不到的收获。
en: “Follow your heart, seize opportunities, don’t worry about the consequences, and you’ll reap rewards you never expected. “

zh: 虽说是毕业歌会，很多歌曲也让非应届毕业生该动。
en: Although it was a song for graduates, it moved many non-graduates as well.

zh: 正常看下来真的想哭，谁的青春都充满美好和遗憾，但都值得怀念，都要勇敢走下去。
en: “After watching the whole presentation, I wanted to cry for the beauty and regrets of youth, because no matter what, they are worth remembering, yet we all have to find the courage to carry on. “

zh: 北京自然生态持续向好，吸引500余种野生动物，城市定居中新网。
en: Natural Ecology in Beijing Continues to Improve, attracting More than 500 Kinds of Wildlife to "Settle" in the City - Ecns.cn

zh: 首都自然生态持续向好，吸引野生动物，城市定居。
en: Natural ecology in Beijing continues to improve, attracting wildlife to "settle" in the city

zh: 北京野生动物已达500余种。
en: Beijing now has more than 500 species of wild animals.

zh: 本报讯记者Robin，北京青年报记者从市园林绿化局获悉，近年来随着首都自然生态环境的持续向好，野生动物的种类和数量也随之持续增加。
en: (Reporter Wang Bin) The Beijing Youth Daily reporter learned from the Beijing Gardening and Greening Bureau that in recent years, as the natural ecology of the capital continues to improve, the species and number of wild animals had also continued to increase.

zh: 目前七夕北京的路上，脊椎野生动物已增加至500余种，包括河马及黑鹳等国家一级保护动物以及白领，大天鹅，灰鹤，鸳鸯等国家二级保护动物。
en: At present, the number of terrestrial vertebrate wildlife inhabiting Beijing exceeds 500, including national first-level protected animals such as the brown-eared pheasant and black stork, as well as national second-class protected animals such as the goral, whooper swan, grey crane and mandarin duck.

zh: 无论是中进二环内的一处处，还是嵌入楼宇之间的小圩湿地，不仅为首都市民带来了大自然的野趣，也吸引着野生动物到城市里定居。
en: Whether urban forests planted within the Second Ring Road or a small wetland embedded between buildings, it not only brings nature's rustic charm to the citizens of the capital, but also attracts wild animals to "settle" in the city.

zh: 剩下时间位于延庆区西北部燕山山脉中的松山国家级自然保护区内，一派生机勃勃。
en: In the summer, the Songshan Nature Reserve in the Yanshan Mountains in the north-west of Yanqing District is full of life.

zh: 一只掉在山涧旁友线玩耍，一旁两只狗互相打闹起来。
en: A raccoon dog is playing by a creek, while two badgers are playing with each other nearby.

zh: 回过头来一只野猪忍不住身上的刺呢，正使劲蹭着树皮，松山国家级自然保护区管理处主任胡巧利介绍，截至2019年底，在这片总面积超过6200公顷的绿海中，生活着包括国家一级保护动物金雕和国家二级保护动物收集百姓在内的178种野生动物，全市近1/3的野生动物种类都能在这里见到踪迹。
en: When looking back, you can see that a wild boar, unable to resist the "itch" on its body, is rubbing against a tree. Hu Qiaoli, Director of the Songshan Nature Reserve Management Office, said that by the end of 2019, 178 species of wildlife, including the golden eagle, a national first-level protected animal, as well as the koklass pheasant and gazelles, national second-level protected animals, have been living in this green zone with a total area of more than 6,200 hectares, and nearly a third of wildlife species in Beijing could be found here.

zh: 在嵩山，野生动物是真正的主人，我们工作人员充其量只能算是人家的保镖。
en: "Here in Songshan, wild animals are the real 'owners' and our staff can at best be thought of as their 'bodyguards'. ”

zh: 胡巧丽说为了实地了解保护区内野生动植物的情况，每天都有30多名专业巡护人员，沿着16条精心制定的保护路线巡查，每个月还会有一趟赚大钱，用一整天的时间几乎走遍整个保护区。
en: Hu Qiaoli said, in order to understand the situation of wildlife in the reserve, more than 30 professional patrol members patrol along 16 specifically developed protection routes every day, and every month there is a major one-day round trip for them to walk through almost the entire reserve.

zh: 在巡查时，不光要检查记录生物多样性情况，还要检查安装人工鸟巢，救护受伤的野生动物，为红外相机等等。
en: "During the patrols, they not only check and record the biodiversity, but also the conditions of artificial bird nests, in addition to rescuing injured wildlife, installing infrared cameras in the field, and so on. ”

zh: 松山国家级自然保护区，现已安装200余台红外相机，记录下林中野生动物的生活状态。
en: Now, the Songshan Nature Reserve has more than 200 infrared cameras to record the living conditions of wildlife in the forest.

zh: 胡巧利介绍，随着这几年保护区生物多样性不断丰富，越来越多的野生动物出现在镜头之中，豹猫，何主管已经成为常驻嘉宾，国家二级保护动物，斑羚的出镜率也越来越高。
en: Hu Qiaoli said that as the reserve's biodiversity has improved over the past few years, more and more wild animals have appeared on camera, with leopard cats, raccoons dogs, and hog-nosed badgers becoming "regular guests"; meanwhile, the goral, a national second-level protected animal, has been captured even more frequently.

zh: 北京市园林绿化局野生动植物和湿地保护处处长张志明介绍。北京陆生脊椎野生动物，已从1994年的461种增加到现在的500多种背景的野生动物种类和数量，近年来持续增加。
en: Zhang Zhiming, Director of the Wildlife and Wetland Protection Department of the Beijing Gardening and Greening Bureau, said that the number of terrestrial vertebrate wildlife in Beijing has increased from 461 species in 1994 to more than 500 species today, and that the number of wildlife species in Beijing has continued to increase in recent years.

zh: 城市中野生动物的身影越发常见于近年来首都城市绿化不断升级密切相关。
en: The increasingly common presence of wildlife in the city is closely related to the continuous upgrading of urban greening in Beijing in recent years.

zh: 特别是2018年开始的新一轮百万亩造林绿化建设，提出要重塑城市生态环境，提升林地绿地的生态功能，突出近自然理念。
en: In particular, the new round of One Million Mu of forestation and greening construction, which began in 2018, intends to reshape the urban ecological environment, enhance the ecological functions of woodlands and greenbelts, and highlight the concept of being "close-to-nature".

zh: 规划上力求与周边绿地实现互联互动，方便野生动物走亲访友中的树叶都是动物们喜爱的蜜月誓约之物。
en: The plan aims to achieve interconnection and interaction with the surrounding greenbelts, so that wild animals can easily "visit their relatives and friends", and the trees planted are nectar and food source plants that these animals love.

zh: 黑土地种出农业现代化，新华网。
en: Agricultural Modernization in the Black Land -- Xinhua Net

zh: 新华社哈尔滨7月26日电题海土地种出农业现代化。
en: Xinhua News Agency, Harbin, July 26th, 2020 Title: Agricultural Modernization in the Black Land

zh: 剩下两架喷屎又系飞机，从友谊农场第五管理区第二作业站的万亩高产示范田掠过，形成两道白线，绿色田野里，用黑色到庙中楚的天下，第1场几个大字格外醒目。
en: In mid-summer, two planes that spray pesticides flew above the Ten Thousand Mu High-Yield Demonstration Field of the Second Work Station, Fifth Management Area, Youyi Farm, forming two white lines, and the large characters “The World’s No.1 Farm” were extremely clear as formed by the black rice seedlings in the green field.

zh: 这个作业站站长孔令强说，这种飞机一天能对6000多亩耕地喷施药剂，效率也是无人机的8倍，是人工的数百倍。
en: Kong Lingqiang, Director of the Work Station, said that such planes were able to spray pesticides over 6,000 mu (400 hectares) of fields per day, the efficiency of which was eight times unmanned aerial vehicle, and hundreds of times that of human labor.

zh: 这个农场位于我国第一产粮大省黑龙江省友谊县境内，冲过去耍的隔道上穿越到如今隆隆的马达声，中华传统农耕与农场在这片黑土地上实现蜕变。
en: The farm is located in Youyi County, Heilongjiang Province, which is the largest grain production base of China, and judging from the swish of cutting the rice seedlings with sickles in the past to the rumble of motors today, we can see that China’s traditional agriculture and farm have changed tremendously in the black land.

zh: 出了飞机，卫星也被用于友谊农场现代化农业生产中。
en: Apart from planes, satellites are also used in the modernized agricultural production of Youyi Farm.

zh: 孔令强介绍一方面他们利用卫星又该技术实现精准施肥，降低农业投入，减少污染。另一方面卫星导航技术可以提高农机田间标准化作业水平。
en: Kong Lingqiang stated that on one hand, they utilized satellite remote sensing technology to achieve accurate fertilization and reduce inputs in agriculture and pollution; on the other , satellite navigation technology improves the standardized work of agricultural machines in the field.

zh: 在今年的水稻生产过程中，农场将卫星导航无人驾驶插秧技术的作业面积从去年的3000亩扩展到3万亩。
en: During the production of rice this year, the farm extended the area utilizing satellite navigation unmanned driving transplantation technology to 30,000 mu (2,000 hectares) from 3,000 mu (200 hectares) last year.

zh: 这项技术令秧苗栽植更加均匀，可是阳光和耕地资源利用最大化，每亩还能节约16元人工成本。
en: Such technology enables more even transplantation of rice seedlings, which maximizes the use of sunlight and arable fields, saving RMB 16 on human labor per mu on average.

zh: 农场在农业生产中尝试信息化，智能化等新技术，形成了从地面到天空的，我国规模最大的农业机械群。
en: The attempt to use new information technologies and intelligent technologies in the farm’s agricultural production is the largest agricultural machine group in China.

zh: 据统计，目前农场农机总保有量4.9万台件，田间综合机械化率达99.8%。
en: According to statistics, there are 49,000 agricultural machines held by the farms at present, and the overall mechanization rate is 99.8%.

zh: 农机作业时限应卫星导航，百分百焊接，精密播种，百分贝瀚天大马力机车作业呗分呗。
en: The rates of using GPS satellite navigation for agricultural machines, accurate sowing in dry land, and using machines with high horsepower on dry land are all 100%.

zh: 绿色农业智慧农业，数字农业是农业现代化的探路方向。
en: “Green agriculture, smart agriculture, and digital agriculture are the directions of exploration in agricultural modernization, ”

zh: 友谊农场场长刘华莲说。
en: Liu Hualian, President of Youyi Farm, said.

zh: 农业现代化关键在于科技进步。
en: The key to agricultural modernization is scientific and technological advancements.

zh: 以农场为代表的黑龙江农垦今年发挥现代化大农业航母示范引领作用，初步建立起规模化种植，标准化生产，产业化经营为主导的现代农业产业体系。
en: The Heilongjiang Agricultural Reclamation Bureau, on behalf of the farms it represents, has fully acted as the “aircraft carrier” of modernized agriculture in recent years, and has firstly built a modern agricultural system characterized by scaled planting, standardized production, and industrialized operation.

zh: 在友谊县郊区有一个占地面积35万平方米的农机博览园。
en: In the suburb of Youyi County, there is an agricultural machine exhibition park covering an area of 350,000 square meters.

zh: 这里集中展出了黑龙江农垦多年来引进使用过的140多台件农机具。
en: It exhibits more than 140 agricultural machines and tools introduced and used by the Heilongjiang Agricultural Reclamation Bureau over the past years.

zh: 这些农机具与农场见证了我国农业现代化发展历程。
en: Those agricultural machines, tools, and farms bear witness the modernization process of Chinese agriculture.

zh: 舍小家为大家安徽合肥江口赫连与群众转移之际，新华网。
en: Sacrifice Individual Interests for the Greater Good: the Direct Impact on People to be Relocated in Jiangkou River, Hefei City, Anhui Province -- Xinhua Net

zh: 新华社合肥7月26日电梯舍小家为大家安徽合肥江口河鲢鱼群众转移之际。
en: Hefei, July 26th, 2020 (Xinhua) Title: Sacrifice Individual Interests for the Greater Good: the Direct Impact on People to be Relocated in Jiangkou River, Hefei City, Anhui Province

zh: 7月25日下午4点多付款，宝穿着糊满泥巴的胶鞋，从前5到后我和妻子周亚磊灰灰的忙着收拾东西。
en: At 4 p.m. on July 25th, Fu Kunbao wore a pair of rubber boots which were covered with mud as he walked from the front room to the back, scurrying to pack items with his wife Zhou Yan.

zh: 街道村干部让专业的电话，我还在田里好吵。
en: “When we got the call asking us to relocated from our village cadres, I was cutting the grass in the field. ”

zh: 付坤波说他流转了60多亩地种了水稻，眼下长势不错，昨天还打了药，工具啥的还都没收拾呢。
en: Fu Kunbao said that he rented over 60 mu field to plant rice, the growth of which was healthy, “I just sprayed the pesticide yesterday, the tools were even not packed. ”

zh: 付款包指了指放在角落里的农药喷雾器，谁都不愿家里被掩，舍小家为大家吧。
en: Fu Kunbao pointed to the pesticide sprayer in the corner, “No one wants his home to be lost in a flood, but we have to sacrifice our own interests for the public good. ”

zh: 为应对巢湖持续高水位压力和可能的强降雨，安徽省合肥市准备在26日7用负控报价所在的江口赫连遇分洪蓄水。
en: To cope with the continuous high water levels at Chaohu Lake and the possible strong downpour, Hefei City is preparing to use a joint embankment at Jiangkou River, where Fu Kunbao’s home is located, to diverge the flood and save water.

zh: 江口河流域位于肥西县紧邻巢湖大地。
en: The joint embankment of Jiangkou River is located in Feixi County, which is close to the bank of Chaohu Lake.

zh: 域内有涉及严店乡和三河镇的几千名村民需要转移。
en: Thousands of villagers in Yandian Village and Sanhe Town will be relocated.

zh: 截至25日16是我国第六大淡水湖，巢湖水位依然维持在13.2米的高位，超保证水位0.7米。
en: By 16:00 on July 25th, the water level of Chaohu Lake, the fifth largest freshwater lake in China, was still 13.2 meters, 0.7 meter higher than the safety level.

zh: 付款报价的厨房收拾得干干净净，桌上放着一盆南瓜，头在冰箱里还有鸡蛋和一些卤菜。
en: The kitchen of Fu Kunbao’s home was neat, with a bowl of pumpkin dishes on the table, and some eggs and vegetables in sauce in the fridge.

zh: 没想到要办江口喝的水，目前看还好。
en: “I never thought I’d have to move away, and the current water level of Jiangkou River looks safe. ”

zh: 周燕说家里是平房，一些大物件，暂时还没想好，放到那里。
en: Zhou Yan said that her house is a bungalow, and she hasn’t found a suitable place to store the large items for now.

zh: 先把贵重的物品收拾好，影响电视机，这些大件可以暂时先放到地势高的邻居或者亲戚家。
en: “I can pack expensive and important items first, and the large items like the fridge and television can be placed at a neighbor’s or relative’s house which is at a higher elevation. ”

zh: 村干部王立文给傅昆宝出主意。
en: Wang Liwen, village cadre, helped Fu Kunbao make plans.

zh: 王立文负责13户村民的转移安置工作，一户一户通知确认每个人的安置方案。
en: Wang Liwen was in charge of the relocation of 13 households, so he informed the villagers one by one, and confirmed the settlement plan with everyone.

zh: 距离付款报价最近的h电视严店乡苏小小学2公里左右的路程。
en: The nearest resettlement place to Fu Kunbao’s home is Suxiao Primary School in Yandian Village, which was two kilometers away.

zh: 出了大殿，让付坤宝两口子头疼的，还有家里1000多斤粮食和新买的一些家具。
en: Apart from the large items, the over 1,000 jin (500 kg) of grain and newly bought furniture was also a headache Fu Kunbao and his wife.

zh: 粮食准备拖到亲戚家，家具没办法办了。
en: “We are going to move the grain to our relative’s home, but we have no way to move the furniture. ”

zh: 夫妻俩一商量，在新买的床下面垫上凳子，把窗台搞了大概半米。
en: After discussion, the couple placed several chairs beneath their new bed, raising it by about 0.5 meters.

zh: 下午6点付款包开始用三轮车往亲戚家运东西，周燕继续在家里收拾。
en: At 6 p.m., Fu Kunbao began to move these items to his relative’s home by tricycle, while Zhou Yan continued to pack at home.

zh: 晚上11点多夫妻俩在家里前前后后看了一遍，拉上了电闸，准备去安置点。
en: At 11 p.m., the couple checked everything across the home, shut down the electricity, and left for the settlement place.

zh: 希望睡早点退吧。
en: “We hope that the flooding ends soon, ”

zh: 付坤宝说。
en: Fu Kunbao said.

zh: 7月26日上午9:30，记者在江口河鲢鱼现场看到当地已做好分红前各项准备。
en: At 9:30 a.m. on July 26th, this journalist saw at Jiangkou River that the local government was fully prepared to divert the flood.

zh: 张继科林小镇组队力挺有机少年新华网。
en: Zhang Jike and Lin Xiaozhai Form a Team to Support Youth with Great Muscles - Xinhua Net

zh: 运动少年热血竞技运动吧，少年在7月11日正式登陆湖南卫视。
en: The inspiring competitive show for youth sports, We Are The One, was officially broadcast on Hunan TV on July 11.

zh: 运动令对张继科和运动助理林晓斋跨界同台。
en: The team leader Zhang Jike and Sports Assistant Lin Xiaozhai are from different fields, but worked together, and commenters Lin Dan and Fu Yuanhui were each unique in their own way, but the appearance of the hardcore “enormous” strength gin pole made the program more “exciting”.

zh: 收集中。
en: During the first episode, 11 young athletes came to the strength arena, and their appearance stunned the audience while arousing significant attention to their “fierce conflict” “robust confrontation”, and “strong hearts”.

zh: 其中。
en: Among them, the “fierce conflict” was from the awe-inspiring student athlete Qiao Wenyi, who publicly provoked “handsome boy” Xu Zhibin on the same racetrack with him when he joked that Xu Zhibin should be on a singing and dancing show, insulting his competitor’s appearance, and even saying that “if you lose, don’t cry or your make-up will run”.

zh: 一番言论，让场上的少年和运动，领队们都倒吸一口凉气。
en: His words made all the young people and sports officials gasp.

zh: 而枪对抗更像是神仙打架。
en: The “robust confrontation” was more like a battle between masters, with “Big Devil” Sun Jianqi competing against the formidable Zhang Xindong in a stunning match.

zh: 而他们的身份也让人始料未及。
en: Their identity was also surprising, with Sun Jianqi an actor who is passionate about fitness, while Zhang Xindong is a retired commando who has won military medals three times.

zh: 比赛一开始。
en: At the start of the match, the two pulled on the small gin pole with all their strength, and the audience was anxious to see their more intense confrontation at the large gin pole.

zh: 在紧张的赛况下。
en: The atmosphere was tense as one of the hosts of the program, Zhang Jike, also watched the battle intently.

zh: 在点评环节。
en: When giving commentary, he was very careful, patiently encouraging the loser and helping him review his mistakes.

zh: 而运动助理林小宅则是花式助攻。
en: But sports assistant Lin Xiaozhai was a marvelous helper, who never concealed her appreciation for these good-looking and competitive young athletes.

zh: 在了解到运动少年们超负荷的日常训练时。
en: After learning about their over-loaded daily training, she admired them a lot.

zh: 同样是运动领队的Linda，和傅园慧则各有风格。
en: The other team leaders, Lin Dan and Fu Yuanhui, were each unique in their own way, with one being a calm “predictor”, while the other was the “bubbly optimistic girl” who eased the tension with her warm smile.

zh: 另外。
en: As sports assistants, Jike and Liu Ye also discussed several funny topics around young athletes.

zh: 法国knight教堂大火，教区志愿者承认纵火，平时和善寡言，中新网。
en: Fire in Cathédrale Saint-Pierre-et-Saint-Paul de Nantes, France: Parochial Volunteer Who was Kind and Taciturn Confessed to Arson-Ecns.cn

zh: 中新网7月26日电，据外媒报道，7月18日，法国南特的宗教历史建筑瑰宝，著名的圣彼得与圣保罗大教堂，在一场火灾当中受到严重损毁，大观风情完全损坏。
en: July 26 (Ecns.cn) According to reports from foreign media, on July 18, the Cathédrale Saint-Pierre-et-Saint-Paul de Nantes, a religious, historical, and architectural treasure, was seriously damaged in a fire, and the great organ was completely destroyed.

zh: 当地时间26日奈特检察官宣布，一名在大教堂当中负责保卫工作的教区志愿者已经被起诉，罪名是纵火毁坏。
en: On the 26th (CET), Nantes prosecutors announced that a parochial volunteer who was responsible for the security of the cathedral had been charged with "arson and destruction."

zh: 他已承认是自己在教堂里点火。
en: The suspect has already pleaded guilty.

zh: 报道称当地检察官塞纳斯表示，这名39岁来自卢旺达的教区志愿者承认自己夜里在大教堂当中的三处点火。
en: According to the report, the local prosecutor Cenas said that the 39-year-old parochial volunteer from Rwanda admitted that he had set fire to three places in the cathedral at night.

zh: 此人的律师则表示总或者现在很后悔做出这种事。
en: His lawyer said that the arsonist now regrets doing such a thing.

zh: 此人几年前通过比赛的途径进入法国，在本次火灾事发地郊区得到庇护，在教堂里得到收留。
en: He entered France via an asylum claim a few years ago, was sheltered in the parish where the fire happened, and was taken in by the church.

zh: 解放之处，最近他尝试更新签证，正在和警察局对此进行对话沟通。
en: Prosecutors noted that recently, the suspect tried to update his visa and was in the process of dialogue with the police.

zh: 但教堂方面表示仍然不敢相信这名平时非常善良，面带笑容，但不怎么说话的信徒，会回他如此热爱的教堂。
en: But workers in the cathedral couldn’t believe that the believer, who was kind and taciturn, would destroy the church he loved so much.

zh: 7月18日火灾发生的当天，这名志愿者就已经因为叙述当中出现逻辑不同的问题，而接受过警方问讯调查，但他后来被释放。
en: On the day of the fire on July 18, the volunteer was questioned by police about inconsistencies in his narrative, but he was later released.

zh: 图为消防员在现场进行救援。
en: Image shows rescue by firefighters at the scene.

zh: 25日晚间，由于巴黎中央警察局实验室的专业工程师获取了新的证据，此人又再一次被传讯。
en: On the evening of the 25th, the man was again subpoenaed as a result of new evidence obtained by professional engineers of the laboratory of the Paris Central Police Station.

zh: 这一次男子承认了自己纵火的行为。
en: This time, the man admitted to his arson.

zh: 据报道，如果蓄意纵火，毁坏的罪名成立，嫌犯将可能面临10年监禁和15万欧元的罚款。
en: If convicted of the crime of deliberate arson and destruction, the suspect will face 10 years' imprisonment and a fine of 150,000 euros.

zh: 报道称此次大火给盛pr与圣保罗大教堂造成了严重损失，教堂内的管风琴被完全烧毁，后面的彩色玻璃窗也受损严重。
en: It was reported that the fire caused serious damage to the Cathédrale Saint-Pierre-et-Saint-Paul de Nantes: the pipe organ in the church was completely burned and the stained glass window behind the pipe organ was also seriously damaged.

zh: 法国历史保护建筑首席建筑师布鲁内认为，保守估计南特大教堂复原工作至少要有三年。
en: Brunel, the chief architect of French Built Heritage Conservation, believes that a conservative estimate of the required cathedral restoration work would take at least three years.

zh: 综合消息没注意破坏两国关系，国际舆论支持中国队没法治新华网。
en: Comprehensive News: The Unilateralism of the United States Destroys Sino-US Relations, International Opinion Supports China’s Countermeasures -- Xinhua Net

zh: 新华社北京7月26日电综合新华社驻外记者报道，7月24日上午中国外交部通知美国驻华使馆，中方决定撤销对美国驻成都总领事馆的设立和运行许可，并对该总领事馆停止一切业务和活动提出具体要求。
en: BEIJING, July 26, 2020 (Xinhua, by foreign correspondents) On the morning of July 24, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People’s Republic of China announced to the US Embassy in China its decision to withdraw its consent for the establishment and operation of the US Consulate General in Chengdu, and the Ministry also made specific requirements for the cessation of all operations and events by the Consulate General.

zh: 国际舆论认为美国采取的单边主义措施给中美两国关系造成严重困扰，中国对美方无理挑衅作出回应，采取反制措施是正当和必要的。
en: International opinion holds the view that the unilateralism adopted by the US severely disturbs normal Sino-US relations, and China’s response to the irrational aggression of the US and its countermeasures against the US are proper and essential.

zh: 智利大学国际问题研究所，中国研究中心主任安德列斯波尔克斯说，美国的单边主义措施破坏了中美两国人民之间理解的桥梁，是两个大国关系遭遇危机。
en: Andres Borquez, Directer of the China Research Center, Institute of International Studies at the University of Chile said that the unilateralism of the US destroyed the bridge between the people of the two countries, leading to the current crisis in Sino-US relations.

zh: 中国通知美国关闭其驻成都总领事馆是对美单边措施的法制，符合外交惯例。
en: Therefore, China’s announcement of its closure of the General Consulate of the United States in Chengdu is a countermeasure against such unilateralism which conforms to the rules of foreign affairs.

zh: 阿根廷天主教大学教授，二中研究中心主任帕特里西奥，朱斯托认为，中方上述决定是对美国先前挑衅的正当必要的反制措施，并非针对普通美国民众。
en: Patricio Giusto, Professor of the Pontifical Catholic University of Argentina and Director of China-Argentina Research Center held the view that,\ China’s decisions were proper and essential countermeasures against the aggression of the US, which was not targeted at its general public.

zh: 美国试图通过施压中国，达到掩盖其应对新规疫情不力的目的，转移美国民众注意力。
en: The US tried to conceal their bad countermeasures against COVID-19 by exerting pressure on China to shift its public attention.

zh: 印度尼西亚智库亚洲创新研究中心主席班邦索尔约诺说，美国采取挑衅性外交姿态，给中美两国关系造成严重困扰，两国关系面临严峻挑战。
en: Bambang Suryono, Chairman of the Asian Creative Research Center, a think-tank in Indonesia, said that the aggressive attitude of the US severely disturbs normal Sino-US relations and brings about severe challenges.

zh: 中国统治美国关闭其驻成都总领事馆是正常反制措施，符合外交惯例，既体现了中国坚决维护自身利益的原则立场，又体现了中国外交的有理有利有节。
en: Thus, China’s announcement of its closure of the General Consulate of the United States in Chengdu is a normal countermeasure which conforms to the rules of foreign affairs and shows China’s principle and stance to firmly defend their self-interests whilst embodying its rationality and principled position, and China’s etiquette of China’s coping with foreign affairs.

zh: 坦桑尼亚时事评论员弗朗西斯sam问着说，中方上述决定是针对美国挑衅作出的正当且必要的回应。
en: Francis Semwenza, a current affairs commentator of Tanzania, said that, China’s decisions were proper and essential responses to the aggression of the US.

zh: 中美关系要重归正常，美方应主动改善与中国关系，停止干涉中国内政。
en: For the re-normalization of Sino-US relations, the US government should actively improve its relationship with China, and quit its intervention in China’s domestic affairs.

zh: 美国应着眼于如何与中国在经济和政治上取得供应，如何造福于两国人民乃至整个国际社会。
en: The US government should focus more on win-win situations in both economic growth and politics, as well as benefiting people of both the two countries and even the whole global community.

zh: 总部位于苏丹的阿拉伯中国友好协会联合会执行主任阿利尤索夫说，中国被迫采取的反制措施是对美方无理行径的政党和必要回应，符合国际法和国际关系基本准则，也符合外交惯例。
en: Ali Yousif, Executive Director of the Sudan-based Association of Arab-Chinese Friendship, said that, the countermeasures forced to be taken were proper and essential responses to the irrational behavior of the US, which conformed to the basic rules of the international law and international relations, as well as the rules of foreign affairs.

zh: 此前美方要求关闭中国驻休斯敦总领事馆，严重违反国际法和国际关系基本准则。
en: The requirement to close the General Consulate of China in Houston seriously disobeyed the basic rules of the international law and international relations.

zh: 希望美方撤销此前有关，决定为两国关系重回正常创造必要条件。
en: And he hoped the US would cancel the relevant decisions and create necessary conditions for the re-normalization of Sino-US relations.

zh: 新加坡联合早报，发表社论说，美国更大的战略意图是要围堵中国，阻止中国继续崛起。
en: An editorial in Singapore’s Lianhe Zaobao said that the broader strategic blueprint of the US was to contain China, and prohibit its continuous rise.

zh: 面对美国的步步紧逼，中方，虽然很不愿意看到中美关系继续恶化，但不得不采取反制措施。
en: In face of the increasingly tight aggression, China was unwilling to witness the continuous deterioration of Sino-US relations, but it had no other choice but to take countermeasures.

zh: 新华社广州7月26日电记者模型记者从广东海警局了解到，近日该局联合广州海关公安部门打掉一个特大走私成品油团伙。初步查证该团伙自2019年以来共走私成品油约12万吨，案值约8亿元人民币，偷逃税款约2.4亿元。
en: Guangzhou, July 26 (Xinhua, Mao Xin) - This reporter learned that the Guangdong Coast Guard Bureau recently cooperated with the Guangzhou Customs District and the Guangdong Provincial Public Security Department to destroy a huge smuggling gang of refined oil products, which was initially found to have smuggled a total of about 120,000 tons of refined oil products since 2019, with a value of about RMB 800 million, and to have evaded taxes of about RMB 240 million.

zh: 广东海警局与海关缉私部门联合逐步摸清了该团伙的人员分工和组织架构。
en: The Guangdong Coast Guard Bureau and the Anti-smuggling Department of the Guangzhou Customs District joined hands in gradually mapping out the division of labor and organizational structure of the gang.

zh: 7月8日黑金黑管，公安部门分别在广州佛山等地以及珠江口海域开展统一收网行动，现场查扣涉嫌走私船舶4艘，分别在涉案船舶和优酷查扣成品油共计4700吨，并冻结一批资金账户。
en: On July 8, the Guangdong Coast Guard Bureau, Guangzhou Customs District, and Guangdong Provincial Public Security Department were united to carry out a draw-in action in Guangzhou, Foshan, the waters of the Pearl River Estuary and other places, seizing four suspected smuggling vessels; the refined oil products found in the vessels and oil depots totaled 4,700 tons, while a number of related capital accounts were frozen.

zh: 据了解，此次联合行动共出动舰艇8艘，直升机两架，分成多个行动小组协同作战，对海上走私路上非法经营等环节进行全链条打击，35名主要犯罪嫌疑人全部到案。
en: It was learned that a total of eight naval vessels and two helicopters were deployed in this joint manhunt, and several action squads were set up to crack down on smuggling at sea and illegal operations on land collaboratively, and during the action, all 35 major suspects were arrested.

zh: 目前该案正在进一步侦办中。
en: The case is currently under further investigation.

zh: 广东海警局相关负责人表示，未来将继续保持高压态势，打击海上各类走私违法犯罪活动，维护好辖区海域良好秩序。
en: The relevant person from the Guangdong Coast Guard Bureau said that in the future, they would continue to intensively combat smuggling and all kinds of illegal and criminal activities at sea in order to maintain good order in the waters under its jurisdiction.

zh: 飓风汉娜登录莫德州或引发河水暴涨和山洪中新网。
en: Hurricane "Hanna" Landing in Texas May Trigger Surges and Flash Floods - China News

zh: 中新网7月26日电综合外媒报道，当地时间25日下午5:00，飓风汉娜登陆美国，德克萨斯州将给德州带来强风暴雨，河水暴涨还可能引发威胁生命的山洪。
en: July 26 (China News) According to reports in foreign media, hurricane “Hanna” landed in Texas at 5:00 p.m. local time on July 25th, bringing strong breeze and rainstorms, surges, and life-threatening flash floods to Texas.

zh: 国家飓风中心说，预计飓风汉娜会携带暴雨扫过德州南部与东北部部分地区局势或引发部分溪水暴涨以及威胁生命的山洪暴发。
en: According to the National Hurricane Center, Hanna is expected to carry rainstorms across parts of southern and northeastern Texas, causing surges and life-threatening flash floods.

zh: 报道称受飓风汉娜影响最严重的是柯柏斯克里斯蒂是难道格兰德河河口地区六格兰德山谷可能爆发大范围的山洪？
en: It was reported that the area from the south of Corpus Christi to the estuary of the Rio Grande River was the area most seriously affected by Hanna, while large flash floods may break out in the Rio Grande Valley.

zh: 德州州长阿博特25日表示任何飓风都是一个巨大的挑战。
en: Abbott, governor of Texas, said on July 25th: "Any hurricane is a huge challenge. "

zh: 该州有三十二个郡，因为飓风进入灾难紧急状态。
en: Thirty two counties in the state have entered a state of emergency due to the hurricane.

zh: 柯柏斯克里斯蒂是这座人口超32万的城市已关闭图书馆与博物馆军民严阵以待。
en: Corpus Christi, a city with a population of more than 320,000, has closed its libraries and museums, and its residents were ready for action.

zh: 阿博特还说，在德州正在遭遇相关疫情重创之际，不能再让这场飓风给德州带来更多伤亡。
en: Abbott also said that the hurricane cannot allowed to bring more casualties to Texas during the pandemic outbreak.

zh: 据报道，德州南部地区降水量预计将在26日夜间达到6~12英寸，德克萨斯州北部地区和路易斯安那州沿海地区也将出现3~5英寸的降雨。
en: According to reports, precipitation in southern Texas was expected to reach 6 to 12 inches at night on July 26th, and 3 to 5 inches in northern Texas and coastal areas of Louisiana.

zh: 由于全球变暖等因素影响汉娜的形成，早于以往的大西洋飓风季。
en: Due to global warming and other factors, Hanna formed earlier than in the previous Atlantic hurricane seasons.

zh: 一般情况下大西洋的第1场飓风通常要到8月中旬才会形成。
en: Normally, the first hurricanes in the Atlantic don't form until mid-August.

zh: 本来将退出欧洲，防止对女子施暴的条约。
en: Poland to Withdraw from the European Treaty on Violence against Women

zh: 波兰司法部星期六表示，波兰下个星期将采取步骤退出欧洲，防止对妇女施暴条约。
en: Poland will take steps next week to withdraw from the European Treaty on the Prevention of Violence against Women, the country's Justice Ministry said Saturday.

zh: 本来右翼的政府内阁表示该条约要求学校教授学生有关性别问题的议题践踏了学生父母的权利。
en: Poland's right-wing government cabinet said the treaty violated the rights of parents by requiring schools to teach students about gender issues.

zh: 波兰司法部长小部落举行记者会说，他领导的司法部星期一将向老公和家庭部提出开始退出条约的要求。
en: Justice Minister Ziobro said at a press conference that his ministry will submit a request on Monday to the Ministry of Labor and the Family to begin withdrawing from the treaty.

zh: 那项条约又名伊斯坦布尔公寓。
en: That treaty is also called the Istanbul Convention.

zh: 小部落说，该条约包含一些我们认为是有害的意识形态性质的元素。
en: Ziobro said,”The treaty contains elements which we consider to be of a harmful and ideological nature ”

zh: 波兰执政的法律与公正党及其执政联盟伙伴跟罗马天主教教会有密切的同盟关系，提倡保守的社会议程。
en: Law and Justice, the ruling party of Poland, and its coalition partners have a close alliance with the Roman Catholic Church and advocate a conservative social agenda.

zh: 波兰总统杜达在这个月成功的连任竞选期间，将敌视同性恋权利作为主要议题之一。
en: Polish president Duda made hostility to gay rights one of the main issues during his successful re-election campaign this month.

zh: 星期五成千上万的波兰人，其中大部分是妇女在华沙和其他一些城市举行反对退出公约的抗议。
en: On Friday, thousands of Polish people (mostly women) protested against withdrawing from the convention in Warsaw and other cities.

zh: 抗议的组织者之一，拉姆帕特在华沙举行的抗议游行中说，退出条约的目的就是将家暴合法化。
en: "The purpose of withdrawing from the treaty is to legalize domestic violence," Lempart, one of the organizers of the protest, said during a protest march in Warsaw.

zh: 一些抗议者举着横幅上面写着法律与公正，党是妇女的地狱。
en: Some protesters carried banners that said "Law and Justice is women's hell."

zh: 法律与公正党长久以来抱怨伊斯坦布尔公约。
en: Law and Justice has long complained about the Istanbul Convention.

zh: 波兰先前的中间派执政的政府，2015年批准了该公约。
en: Poland's previous centrist government ratified the convention in 2015.

zh: 法律与公正党政府表示该条约不尊重宗教要求，在学校里教授自由派的社会政策。
en: Law and Justice says the treaty does not respect religion and requires liberal social policies to be taught in schools.

zh: 但截至目前改灯一直没有决定退出给公寓。
en: But so far, the party has not decided to withdraw from the convention.

zh: 巴西总统行馆病毒检测结果join新华网。
en: COVID-19 Test Results of President of Brazil Now Negative - Xinhua Net

zh: 新华社巴西利亚7月25日点记者周行助。巴西总统波索纳罗25日在他的个人社交媒体账号上宣布，他的最新一次新冠病毒检测结果为银杏。
en: Brasilia, July 25th, 2020 (Xinhua, Zhou Xingzhu) Jair Messias Bolsonaro, President of Brazil, announced on his personal social media account that his latest COVID-19 test result was negative.

zh: 除公布最新检测结果外不说，那罗还在社交媒体上发布了自己收吃亏要和儿的照片。
en: Apart from announcing his latest test result, he also uploaded a photo holding a box of hydroxychloroquine on social media.

zh: 波索纳德一直坚称这种药物能有效治疗新冠病毒感染，并多次通过社交媒体直播展示自己服用此药。
en: He has long claimed that the drug is helps in the treatment of COVID-19, and has livecast his use of the drug on social media many times.

zh: 据巴西媒体报道，不做那罗当天宣布病毒检测结果后驾摩托车出行，前往首都巴西利亚多地还与一名国会众议员见面。
en: According to Brazilian media, after his announcement of the test results, he drove his motorcycle to many places including Brasilia, and met with a member of the National Congress of Brazil.

zh: 此前播出那罗一直在总统官邸隔离办公。
en: Previously, he had been quarantined in his official residence and working from there.

zh: 波索纳罗本月7日在当地多家媒体联合直播中宣布，他本人6日进行的新冠病毒检测结果为阳性，14日和21日又进行了两次检测，结果均呈阳性。
en: On July 7th, he announced in a joint live broadcast on multiple media that the result of his COVID-19 test on July 6th was positive, and he was tested twice more on the 14th and 21st, both of which were positive.

zh: 江西为抗洪一线青年入伍开辟绿色通道，新华网。
en: Jiangxi Province opens a “green passage” for young people fighting flooding at the frontline to enlist in the army -- Xinhua Net

zh: 新华社南昌7月26日，郭东明雄亮，江西省人民政府征兵办公室近日明确对在这次抗洪抢险救灾任务中表现突出的个人或其子女符合应征条件，且体检政治考核双合格的机遇优先定兵。
en: Xinhua News Agency, Nanchang, July 26th, 2020 (Guo Dongming, Xiong Liang) The servicemen recruitment office of the Jiangxi Provincial People’s Government recently announced that for individuals with outstanding performance in fighting flooding, if they or their children conform to the conditions to be serve and pass both the physical examination and political evaluation, they will be prioritized for enlistment.

zh: 应征青年登记后，我们将联合应征青年所在社区，街道武装部和浔阳区征兵办核实后，予以优先定兵。
en: “After the young people wishing to be recruited register, we will check their information alongside with the communities they live in, their neighborhood armed forces departments, and the recruitment office in Xunyang District, and then prioritize their enlistment. ”

zh: 九江市浔阳区人武部副部长王辉说受洪灾影响，他们从25日开始集中三天时间组织应征青年体检。
en: Wang Hui, the vice director of the People’s Armed Forces Department of Xunyang District, Jiujiang City, Jiangxi Province, said that influenced by the flooding, they would organize physical examinations for the young people to be recruited within three days of July 25th.

zh: 九江市浔阳区应征青年周景凡是一名22岁的大学毕业生，他的母亲是社区工作人员，父亲是空军某部的退伍老兵是几天来周静的父母一直在防汛抗洪一线值班值守。
en: Zhou Jingfan is a 22-year-old college graduate to be recruited in Xunyang District, Jiujiang City whose mother works in a community, and his father is a veteran retired from a department of the Air Force; during the past ten days, his parents have been on duty at the frontline to fight against the flooding.

zh: 这些天在新闻里看到人民子弟兵奋不顾身在抗洪一线保卫着自己的家乡，我也想成为像他们一样的人。
en: “These days, when seeing servicemen in the news fighting at the frontline to protect our hometown regardless of their personal safety, I am deeply touched, and strongly desire to be like them. ”

zh: 周经发说他从小就有个从军梦，通过这次抗洪更加坚定了他投身军营的决心。
en: Zhou Jingfan said, and the fight against the flooding this year further solidified his childhood dream to become a soldier.

zh: 九江市抗洪抢险作为征兵宣传的活教材，他们以社区为单位，号召应征青年自愿参加到巡逻值班值守等任务中，该物人民军队的性质宗旨，决定他们参军报国的信心。
en: Jiujiang City also used the fight against flooding as a “living textbook” for service propaganda, calling for young people to be recruited to voluntarily be on duty in their communities, so as to show the mission of the people’s army on the spot and strengthen their determination to work for the country.

zh: 九江市浔阳区人武部政委骆秋雨说，通过优先定兵的方式，希望能激励更多应征青年，营造出参加任务光荣，参军光荣的良好社会氛围。
en: Luo Jiuyu, political commissar of the People’s Armed Forces Ministry of Xunyang District, Jiujiang City, said that they hoped to encourage more young people to enlist in the army for a better social atmosphere, highlighting tasks and military service as a means for prioritizing themselves for enlistment.

zh: 据越通社报道里认为，越南25年内为东盟的发展做出巨大贡献。
en: The VIetnam News Agency (VNA) reports that Grigory Karasin believes Vietnam has contributed heavily to ASEAN’s development over the past 25 years.

zh: 越南不仅是东盟负责任的一员，更是东盟的火车头。
en: More than just a responsible member of ASEAN, Vietnam is its “locomotive”.

zh: 格利沃里表示俄罗斯乃至亚欧经济联盟认为越南为东盟提高其地位，对外推广其形象作出贡献。
en: Grigory stated that both Russia and the Eurasian Economic Union believe Vietnam has contributed greatly to raising ASEAN’s profile and promoting its image in other parts of the world.

zh: 他强调东盟因此应该感谢越南。
en: He said, “Vietnam deserves ASEAN’s thanks for these things. “

zh: 格利沃利表示分析人士对越南所提出的和平倡议给予认可。
en: He also said that analysts have expressed approval for Vietnam’s peace initiative.

zh: 越南愿意同东盟各国分享经验，对包括东海问题在内的亚太地区面临的问题提出建设性的和平措施。
en: Vietnam hopes to share its experience with other ASEAN countries and build constructive, peaceful mechanisms to address issues in the Asia-Pacific region, including those in the East China Sea.

zh: 关于越南与俄罗斯在东盟框架下的合作，格利沃利认为越南与俄罗斯与东盟的合作关系提供支持，帮助俄罗斯在这一合作框架下获得利益。
en: In terms of Vietnam-Russia cooperation within the ASEAN framework, Grigory believes ASEAN provides support for the cooperative relationship between Vietnam and Russia, and that Russia benefits from the cooperative framework provided by ASEAN.

zh: 包括俄罗斯在内的亚欧经济联盟与越南签署自贸协定后，能够进军东盟市场。
en: Once a free trade agreement is signed between Vietnam and the Eurasian Economic Union, which includes Russia, the Eurasian Economic Union will be able to enter the ASEAN market.

zh: 格利沃利建议最大限度扩大亚欧经济联盟与东盟各国的自由贸易区，进而创造经济和安全稳定的平台。
en: Grigory advises that the free trade area between ASEAN countries and the Eurasian Economic Union be enlarged to the maximum possible extent to create a platform for economic and security stability.

zh: 隔离我里同时相信俄罗斯，越南与东盟正在步入正轨，并将实现其目标。
en: At the same time, Grigory believes that Russia, Vietnam, and the Eurasian Economic Union are on the right track, and that each will be able to achieve its goals.

zh: 从现在到2020年底，背景声将具备必要条件，尤其是在基础设施，人力资源和土地等方面，以便主动应对外资流入，特别是拥有价值链和转让先进技术的跨国集团。
en: From now until the end of 2020, particularly in terms of basic infrastructure, human resources, and land, Bac Giang Province will possess the conditions necessary to actively seek inflows of foreign investment, especially for multinational groups which possess value chains and transfer advanced technologies.

zh: 此为背景声将办理后，递交政府总理决定对粤海工业区基础设施建设与经营项目投资的组长和批准将本生安到北仑河岸两个工业城市服务业取补充列入至2020年越南工业区发展总体规划的文件。
en: Bac Giang Province has also completed and submitted its plan to enact the Prime Minister’s directive to invest in infrastructure building and operations projects in the Vietnam-Korea Industrial Zone, and has approved the addition of two industry-city-service zones in the province, Anshan-Beilong and Anlu, to the 2020 Vietnam Industrial Zone Development Master Plan document.

zh: 与此同时被蒋生着力加快各项目的进度，尤其是在合肥广州，双喜内黄等工业园区集群的基础设施建设经营项目，为招商引资形成土地资金。
en: At the same time, Bac Giang is working to accelerate progress on every project, especially for infrastructure building and operations in the Hefu, Guangzhou, and Shuangxi industrial zones, to form a land fund to attract investment.

zh: 在2020年内，北江省工贸局才就定工业区工业集群规划建言献策已纳入省规划。
en: In 2020, the Department of Industry and Trade of Bac Giang Province will assist in planning industrial zones and clusters, and make suggestions and proposals for these to be included in provincial planning.

zh: 背景声确定，将发展工业园区集群与保障国防安全，保护生态环境，保障粮食安全相结合，进而助推工业均衡发展，拥有全面的电力，供水，交通和电信等基础设施，并与城市建设，贸易服务，工人，住房和医疗卫生教育等其他社会基础设施等相结合。
en: Bac Giang has determined that it will integrate national defense, ecological and environmental protection and food security guarantees into the development of industrial clusters; they will possess comprehensive basic infrastructure for electricity, water supply, transportation, and telecommunications, and will be combined with the basic infrastructure required by other social fields such as city-building, trade services, worker housing, medical treatment, and education.

zh: 在工业区北，江省着力呼吁对电力电子电信设备，精密机械，辅助工业等领域中的高科技清洁技术的投资项目。
en: In industrial zones, Bac Giang Province is seeking high-tech and clean technology investment projects in fields such as power, electronics, telecommunications equipment, precision machinery, and their supporting industries.

zh: 在工业园区集群，该省呼吁对生产利用就地劳动力，尤其是农产品，食品加工等领域的中小型规模投资项目。
en: In industrial zone clusters, the province seeks small and medium-scale investment projects for which production and utilization engages local labor, especially in areas such as food products and food processing.

zh: 未来，北京市将着力加快对北江市后勤物流中心的基础设施的投资与工业园区集群同步发展，以优化货物货币流通和，有助于降低生产成本，提高货物价值，优化供应链，发展多式联运，从而为投资者投资与人生创造吸引力。
en: In the future, Bac Giang Province plans to accelerate basic infrastructure investment in the logistics center of Bac Giang City and allow it to develop simultaneously with industrial park zones as a means to optimize the circulation of goods and money, effectively lower production costs, enhance the value of goods, improve supply chains, and develop more combined transport networks, and thereby make the province more attractive for investors.

zh: 省级白俄罗斯武装直升机卡乌2，年底首次出场新华网。
en: Upgraded Russian Armed Helicopter Kamov Ka-52M will Leave the Factory for the First Time at the End of the Year - Xinhua Net

zh: 新华社莫斯科7月25日电，根据俄罗斯国防部计划俄武装直升机，吓成无知。卡乌2的升级板卡乌尔英文将于今年12月首次完成改造换装并出场，该机型在侦查通信和武器性能方面将有较大提升。
en: MOSCOW, July 25 (Xinhua) According to the plan of Russian Defense Ministry, the upgraded version of the Russian Armed Helicopter Kamov Ka-52, the Kamov Ka-52M, will be complete and leave the factory for the first time in December; the new helicopter will have greatly enhanced detection, communication, and weapon performance.

zh: 据俄消息报日前报道，无知卡无二英文名为超级短吻鳄，企业置合同于去年4月由俄军方与军工单位签订，目前售价150只，正在恶补航空航天集团公司的远东直升机制造厂，接受改造换装，其国家级测试和改进收尾工作将于2022年10月前结束。
en: According to recent reports in Russia’s Izvestiya, the Kamov Ka-52M is nicknamed the “Super Alligator”, and the contract for its development was signed between the Russian military and military institutions in April last year; now, the first batch of the two upgraded Kamov Ka-52M are being completed at the Far Eastern Helicopter Factory of Russian “Progress” Aerospace Cooperation, and national-level testing and final improvements of the design will conclude by October 2022.

zh: 据了解上述审计工作的饿专家介绍，超极端恶的前辈无知卡无二于2011年11月正式列装，该机型在使用中暴露出一些弱点，此次改造升级正是为了不断吧。
en: According to Russian experts familiar with the aforementioned upgrading work, the “predecessor” of the “Super Alligator”, the Kamov Ka-52, was officially commissioned in November 2011, but defects were discovered during use, so the upgrading was designed to for “address the defects”.

The report claimed that, in comparison with the Kamov Ka-52, the Kamov Ka-52M would partially use new armor materials which would not increase its weight, the seat of pilots would be consolidated with new equipment to defend against missile attacks to increase the possibility of survival in the battlefield, and it also has: a stronger power generator to generate electricity for more complex airborne electronic equipment; upgraded light and electricity systems, which detect and identify targets in the battlefield at great distances; new light missiles with multiple uses to mainly attack armored vehicles and reinforced concrete fortifications at a range of up to 20 kilometers, double the range of the same missile used in the current helicopter; and defensive weapons and communication equipment will be commonly used with Mi-28NM, which is able to attack targets in the air to make protection work more convenient and economical.

zh: 此外，卡乌尔英文将拥有更先进的电子制导系统武器瞄准系统和导航设备。
en: Besides, the Kamov Ka-52M will have more advanced electronic guidance systems, weapons targeting systems, and navigation equipment.

zh: 俄专家还表示值得关注的是，卡尔英文将配备于无人机联络的通信设备，从而在空中实时获得附近无人机传输的情报。例如在该直升机的座舱屏幕上显示无人机拍摄的影像。
en: Russian experts also said that the Kamov Ka-52M would be equipped with communication equipment to connect with UAV’s to obtain real-time information transmitted by nearby airborne unmanned drones, so for instance, it can display photos taken by UAV’s on its cabin screen.

zh: 按计划卡位英文的飞行员能直接操控与其配合的无人机，从而提高飞行员对战场形势的掌握和对远程导弹的制导。
en: According to the plan, the Kamov Ka-52M pilot will directly operate the coordinated UAV’s to improve their command of the battlefield and the guidance of long-distance missiles.

zh: 据俄媒体报道，俄国防部副部长克里沃鲁奇科在去年12月曾表示，俄国防部计划在2027年前购买110多家物质卡乌尔。
en: It is reported by Russian media that Alexei Krivoruchko, Vice Minister of the Russian Defense Ministry, said in December last year that Russian Defense Ministry was projected to purchase over 110 Kamov Ka-52M helicopters by 2027.

zh: 新法令规定，卡帕尼亚大区自即日起，室内公共场所必须戴口罩者，最高可处以1000欧元罚金。
en: According to a new decree, people must wear masks in indoor public places in Campania from now on, and offenders can be fined up to 1,000 euros.

zh: 当地时间6月1日，意大利首都罗马，罗马斗兽场重新开放。
en: The Colosseum in Rome, the capital of Italy, was reopened on June 1 local time.

zh: 据报道，根据大区政府颁布的最新防御法令，卡帕尼亚大区，民众乘坐所有公共交通工具，以及出入商店，酒吧超市和展馆等室内公共场所均必须遵照防疫要求，佩戴口罩。
en: It is reported that according to the latest pandemic prevention law issued by the regional government, people in Campania must wear masks in accordance with the requirements when taking all public transport, as well as in and out of shops, bars, supermarkets, exhibition halls, and other indoor public places.

zh: 违反该规定者，最高可处以1000欧元罚金。
en: Offenders can be fined up to 1,000 euros.

zh: 法令同时规定进入卡帕尼亚大区的所有来自非申根国家的旅客均需进行隔离。
en: The decree also stipulates that all passengers who are not from Schengen countries entering Campania must be quarantined.

zh: 大区政府将授权卫生机构协调安排特定酒店，对阳性无症状者进行隔离。
en: The regional government will authorize health institutions to coordinate and arrange specific hotels to quarantine asymptomatic infections.

zh: 该法令7月25日起正式生效。
en: The decree came into effect on July 25.

zh: 在不到一个小时的时间内，已有三名进入超市的顾客，接受了罚款。
en: In less than an hour, three customers who entered the supermarket without wearing masks were fined.

zh: 河北今年以来呵护生态补水17.5亿立方米中新网。
en: Ecological water restoration of 1.75 billion cubic meters to rivers and lakes has been realized in Hebei Province so far this year -Ecns.cn

zh: 新华社石家庄7月26日电记者王昆。记者从河北省水利厅了解到今年以来，河北省统筹利用降水和盆地水库水，陆续向普陀荷塘和拒马河等28条河流和白洋淀实施生态补水，累计完成河湖生态补水17.5亿立方米。
en: SHIJIAZHUANG, July 26 (Xinhua, by Wang Kun) According to the Department of Water Resources of Hebei Province, since this year, Hebei Province has been coordinating the water diverted from rivers and local reservoirs to implement ecological water replenishment of a total of 1.75 billion cubic meters to 28 rivers and lakes including Hutuo River, Tang River, Juma River, and Baiyang Lake.

zh: 河北省紧紧抓住南水北调中线工程，加大流量输水的有利时机，利用引江水向唐河沙和潴龙河等河流，实施了生态补水。
en: Hebei Province seized the opportunity to increase the flow of water from the South-to-North Water Diversion Middle Route Project and implemented ecological water replenishment to rivers such as the Tang River, the Sha River, and the Zhulong River with the diverted river water.

zh: 与此同时，利用西大洋动物室等9座大中型水库及白洋淀向阜阳和青龙河等河流实施了生态补水，累计形成水面面积超过90平方公里。
en: Meanwhile, nine large and medium-sized reservoirs, Xidayang Reservoir and Dongwushi reservoir for example, and Baiyang Lake supplied water to rivers such as Fuyang River and Qinglong River, creating a total water surface area of over 90 square kilometers.

zh: 为做好生态补水工作，河北省水利厅积极组织开展补水河流隐患排查整治加固和河道清洁工作，细化实化措施，加强巡查管护。
en: In order to do a good job of ecological water replenishment, the Department of Water Resources of Hebei Province actively organizes the investigation of hidden hazards, rectification and reinforcement, and river cleaning work to strengthen inspection and management with detailed and practical implementation measures.

zh: 通过督导检查与集中暗访，及时解决各类问题，确保了河流补水，安全，有序。
en: Through supervision, inspection, and intensive & secret inquiries, various problems were resolved in time to ensure the safe and smooth replenishment work.

zh: 据河北省水利厅相关负责人介绍，河湖生态补水的有序实施，有效修复了河北省河湖水生态环境，促进了沿岸地下水的恢复和海洋，极大改善了沿线人民环境和经济发展环境，对实现水清岸绿，河畅，景美的河湖管理保护目标具有重要意义。
en: According to the person in charge of the relevant division in the Department of Water Resources of Hebei Province, the smooth ecological water replenishment effectively restored the ecological environment of rivers and lakes in Hebei Province, and was also conducive to the replenishment and nourishment of groundwater along the river bank; besides greatly improving the living and economic development environment, it is deeply significant in the process of realizing the goal of "clear water, green shores, unobstructed courses, and beautiful scenery" for managing and protecting rivers and lakes.

zh: 德国之声中文网过去两周内，西班牙的新贵却冠病例大幅回升，昨日出现上千新增病例。
en: (Deutsche Welle Chinese) Over the past two weeks, the number of new confirmed COVID-19 cases has risen sharply, with thousands of new cases over the past several days.

zh: 英国政府周六7月25日晚间临时决定从当地时间26日零点起，将西班牙从安全旅行名单中一处，从西班牙入境英国的人必须隔离14天。
en: The UK government issued a temporary decision on Saturday evening (July 25th) that starting on the 26th, local time, Spain will be removed from the travel corridors list, and that people entering the UK from Spain must quarantine for 14 days.

zh: 正在西班牙度假的英国游客听闻此项决定，纷纷表示惊讶，担心甚至愤怒，因为消息突如其来令人措手不及。
en: UK tourists on vacation in Spain expressed surprise, worry, and anger when they heard about the decision, as the sudden news caught them off guard.

zh: 据报道，英国交通大臣沙普斯英文目前也在西班牙度假。
en: Reports state that UK Transportation Secretary Grant Shapps is currently vacationing in Spain.

zh: 英国发布隔离措施前，挪威也已宣布从西班牙返回挪威的人要进行为期10天的隔离。
en: Prior to the UK’s announcement of the new quarantine measures, Norway also announced that people traveling to Norway from Spain would need to isolate for 10 days.

zh: 法国和比利时，建议本国居民放弃前方巴塞罗那以及周边地区度假的计划。
en: France and Belgium advised their residents to preemptively cancel any vacation plans in Barcelona and its surrounding areas.

zh: 这些地区的height人满为患，人与人之间无法保持社交距离，警察一度需要采取措施以减少游客的数量。
en: The overcrowding on beaches in these areas makes it impossible to maintain social distancing, and police have been required to take measures to reduce the number of tourists on beaches.

zh: 旅游业是西班牙的重要支柱产业。
en: Tourism is one of Spain’s most important industries.

zh: 西班牙这里是安全的。
en: Spain: This is a safe place.

zh: 针对英国作出的决定，西班牙外交部周日表示疫情得到控制。
en: In response to the UK’s decision, Spain’s Ministry of Foreign Affairs expressed on Sunday that the country’s epidemic was under control.

zh: 西班牙外交部长冈萨雷斯英文向媒体强调西班牙是安全的，不仅对西班牙人而言，对游客来说也是安全的。
en: Spanish Foreign Minister Arancha Gonzalez Laya stated to the media, “Spain is a safe place, not just for Spanish citizens, it’s also safe for tourists. “

zh: 西班牙政府将试图说服英国政府，将巴利阿里群岛英文和加那利群岛排除在隔离措施之外。
en: Spain’s government will make attempts to persuade the UK government that the Balearic Islands and Canary Islands should be excluded from the quarantine measures.

zh: 理由是这两个旅游胜地的感染率远低于英国本土。
en: Their reasoning is that the infection rate in these two tourist destinations is significantly lower than in the UK.

zh: 为防止疫情扩散，西班牙加泰罗尼亚地区也已重启禁租令。
en: The Catalonia region of Spain has also reinstated its “football ban” to curb the epidemic.

zh: 旅游业是西班牙的重要支柱产业，而西班牙是最受英国游客青睐的度假地之一。
en: Tourism is one of Spain’s pillar industries, and the country is one of the most popular vacation destinations for UK tourists

zh: 隐过了这一决定，预计将会使西班牙的旅游业大受影响。
en: The UK’s decision is expected to have a significant impact on Spain’s tourism industry.

zh: 中付收日北京暂别高温酷暑，开启降雨模式，新华网。
en: First day of Zhongfu: Escaping the intense heat as the rainy days start in Beijing -- Xinhua Net

zh: 新华社北京7月26日电，记者宁愿7月26日是今年的中伏首日。
en: BEIJING, July 26, 2020 (Xinhua, by Ni Yuanjin) July 26 marks the beginning of “Zhongfu (the second phase of Sanfu)” this year.

zh: 26日凌晨的大风骤雨对流天气驱散了连日来笼罩在北京地区的高温酷暑，新一轮降雨天气将持续数日。
en: During the small hours of July 26, the convective weather caused by strong wind and sudden downpours dispersed the intense heat that had lasted for several days; the rain will last for another several days.

zh: 北京市气象台26日11:00发布成26日，北京有分散性阵雨伴有弱雷电，日最高气温仅为27℃，夜间阴有小到中雨伴有弱雷电，夜间最低气温为23℃。
en: According to the report from the Beijing Meteorological Service released at 11:00 on July 26, there will be scattered showers on July 26 in Beijing (with weak thunder and lightning), and the highest temperature will be just 27 degrees Celsius; at night, it will be cloudy with light to moderate rain (with weak thunder and lightning), and the lowest temperature will be 23 degrees Celsius.

zh: 而在此前的24日至25日，北京全市处在高温蓝色预警中，大部地区日最高气温在37℃，局地出现超过40℃的高温。
en: However, on July 24 and 25, Beijing was under a blue alert for high temperature; the highest temperature of most regions was 37 degrees Celsius, while some regions were even hotter, with a temperature of over 40 degrees Celsius.

zh: 伏天是一年之中气温最高，潮湿闷热的日子，一年有三伏，最热在中伏，中国百姓说的苦夏就在此时。
en: Sanfu is the period with the highest temperature and humidity within a year, consisting of “three phases” every year, the second of which is the hottest, the period when people “lose their appetites”.

zh: 护肤世家填满谷仓，民间有一伏饺子二伏面的说法。
en: As the sanfu days draw near, people always fill their homes with diverse grains, and “eating dumplings for the first phase of Sanfu, while eating noodles for the second” is a long-lasting folk custom.

zh: 根据目前预报，未来三天北京多阴雨天气。
en: According to current weather reports, in the next three days, there will be clouds and rain in Beijing.

zh: 气象部门提示公众尽量减少山区游玩，警方地质灾害。
en: The meteorological service reminds us that mountain tours should be reduced in case of geological disasters.

zh: 据了解今年的中伏有20天，从7月26日开始至8月14日结束。
en: It is estimated that the second phase of Sanfu will last for 20 days, from July 26 to August 14.

zh: 进入中伏后，人会感到身体乏力，食欲不振。
en: During these days, people always feel feeble and have no appetite.

zh: 饮食上可选择绿豆，苡仁等具有清热解暑健脾开胃作用的食物，以及蔬菜，苦瓜等苦味食物，可有助于增进食欲取出数据。
en: Therefore, mung beans and coix seeds should be eaten to clear the heat, invigorate the spleen, and stimulate the appetite, and bitter foods such as sow thistle and bitter gourd can also be eaten for the same functions.

zh: 发动机可能喜欢英文，吉林查2000架波音客机，新华网。
en: FAA launches urgent investigation of 2,000 passenger jets due to possible engine stalling - Xinhuanet

zh: 美国联邦航空局英文24日发布紧急适航指令，要求对在美注册的大约2000架波音737英文和计算器英文客机做经济检查，原因是上述科技的空气只会发造福时候，可能导致发动机空中停车。
en: On the 24th, the Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) issued an emergency Airworthiness Directive demanding an urgent inspection of the roughly 2,000 737NG and 737 Classic airliners registered in the US due to the fact that corrosion of the airliners’ air check valves may cause the engines to stall while in midair.

zh: 联邦航空局说，迄今收到4份737英文和737客机发动机空中停车的报告，因而作出经济检查要求，检查对象是连续停放7天及以上的科技和重新投入飞行后迄今飞行次数低于11次的客机。
en: The FAA said it has received reports of 4 incidents of 737NG and 737 Classic aircraft engines stalling in midair, so it has issued the emergency inspection order for all passenger aircraft that have been idled for 7 days or more or reactivated aircraft which have made fewer than 11 flights.

zh: 列本航空局警告科技全部两台发动机的第5季只会发如果都早复试可能卡死在打开位置，导致科技完全失去动力且无法重启发动机。
en: The FAA warned that if the Level 5 check valves in both engines of a passenger airliner become corroded, they may become stuck in the open position, causing the aircraft to completely lose power and be unable to restart its engines.

zh: 这一航空监管机构下令，一旦发现只会发到付，是航空运营商，必须在客机再次投入使用前更换这一关键部件。
en: The regulatory agency’s order stipulates that if a check valve is found to be corroded, this critical component must be immediately replaced by the operator before the airplane may be returned to service.

zh: 波音公司当天晚些时候回应疫情爆发，导致出行需求降低，不少客籍婴儿被封存或较少使用，挥发更容易遭腐蚀。
en: Boeing responded later the same day, saying that because many aircraft had been idled or used less frequently due to the lower demand for travel caused by the COVID-19 epidemic, “which can make check valves more susceptible to corrosion”.

zh: 波音同时说，已经建议航空运营商检查指令设计的科技，如果发现问题，波音将提供检修和更换止回阀等方面帮助。
en: At the same time, Boeing stated it has advised all operators to immediately inspect aircraft affected by the order, and if problems are discovered, Boeing will provide repair, replacement air check valves, and similar assistance.

zh: 美联社报道，美国主要航空运营商旗下客机通常一天内多次飞行，但在疫情爆发后大批客机停飞，随着旅客出行需求尽力缓慢增长一些客机，重新投入运营。
en: The AP reported that aircraft owned by major US carriers typically fly several times a day, but due to the COVID-19 epidemic, a large number of airlines have been idled; as return for travel has gradually started to return, some of these aircraft have been returned to service.

zh: 联邦航空局没有发布4份空中停车报告的详细内容。
en: Details of the 4 reported stalling incidents were not released by the FAA.

zh: 阿拉斯加航空公司24日晚些时候披露其中一期事件。
en: Later on the 24th, Alaska Airlines disclosed that one of the incidents occurred on their aircraft.

zh: 这一航空运营商在声明中说旗下一架客机7月15日从华盛顿州西雅图飞往德克萨斯州奥斯汀途中，一台发动机突然熄火，客机，最终在奥斯汀机场成功紧急降落。
en: The airline released a statement claiming that as its aircraft was flying from Seattle, Washington to Austin, Texas, one of the engines suddenly stalled, and the aircraft finally made an emergency landing in Austin.

zh: 阿拉斯加航空公司说已经更换那架客机的发动机，且已经按照联邦航空局指令检查6架客机的发动机。
en: Alaska Airlines said it had already replaced the aircraft’s engine and had inspected the engines of 6 more aircraft as directed by the FAA.

zh: 美国航空公司联合航空公司和西南航空公司24日分别说下客机没有出现关联空气智慧法的发动机熄火情况。
en: On the 24th, American Airlines, United Airlines, and Southwest Airlines stated they had not experienced air check valve-related engine stalling on their aircraft.

zh: 美国航空公司旗下4架客机将接受检查，联合航空公司旗下28架客机将接受检查。
en: Four American Airlines aircraft will be inspected, and 28 United Airlines aircraft will be inspected.

zh: 达美航空公司说将检查旗下20架客机，但没有说明是否出现过发动机熄火情况。
en: Delta Airlines declared that it will inspect the 20 affected aircraft it operates, but that no stalling incidents had occurred on its aircraft.

zh: 多家媒体报道，联邦航空局紧急事行指令是对播音的又一次冲击。
en: Reports from several press bureaus note that the FAA emergency Airworthiness Directive was another blow to Boeing.

zh: 印度尼西亚狮子航空公司和埃塞俄比亚航空公司各一架波音737英文科技分别于2018年10月和2019年3月10日合计至346人。
en: Indonesia’s Lion Air and Ethiopian Airlines each experienced a Boeing 737 Max crash in October 2018 and March 2019, respectively, with a total of 346 fatalities.

zh: 这一系列客机随后全球停飞，今年1月停车，5月恢复生产。
en: Flights of this model were subsequently grounded globally, production ceased in January of this year, and was resumed in May of this year.

zh: 联邦航空局局长史蒂夫迪克森6月承认就七撒起英文科技，联邦航空局在对波音的监管上犯了错。
en: FAA Administrator Stephen Dickson admitted in June that the FAA “made a mistake” in its supervision of the 737 Max.

zh: 京东上线老师好，下周上线，凤岭县知事发起人新华网。
en: Ding Dong! Hello, Teacher Will Be Broadcast Next Week, with Xue Zhaofeng Playing the “Knowledge Initiator” - Xinhua Net

zh: 又有新综艺上线。
en: There is a new variety show.

zh: 互动知识分享节目叮咚上线老师好！
en: The interactive knowledge sharing program Ding Dong! Hello, Teacher, will be broadcast in Hunan TV on July 20.

zh: 据了解。
en: The program will create a new youth classroom for all ages, with a team of good-looking and accomplished teachers on stage to present challenging and hilarious knowledge.

zh: 与EVA老师群体在大众心中的严肃印象不同。
en: Different from the serious impression left by teachers upon the general public, Ding Dong! Hello, Teacher brings together a group of good-looking and accomplished knowledge elites.

zh: 他们既是来自各学科的青年，只是榜样。
en: They are all young specialists in different subjects, and comprehensive “punsters” good at educating through entertainment.

zh: 节目中。
en: During the program, these extraordinary young professors will act as “knowledge sharers”, creating a challenging, fun, and educational environment.

zh: 他们需要通过有态度的知识输出。
en: They will provide knowledge using their own attitudes and show the most interesting aspects of their subjects to inspire the live audience.

zh: 而全年龄观众组成的游道问问谢长辉提出北边问题。
en: The “Panel of Questioners” composed of audience members of all ages will raise diverse questions on the spot, making the job of delivering lectures even more difficult for the “knowledge sharers”, which will also inject a certain edge to the program.

zh: 据透露。
en: According to sources, the “knowledge sharers” include many excellent young teachers such as Li Yongle, a physics teacher from the High School Affiliated to Renmin University of China, Zhang Xuefeng, a well-known teacher in guiding students to get good grades in the postgraduate entrance examination, and Wang Lei, a history teacher with a decade of working experience, who will present the “hardcore” knowledge of different subjects to the live audience in ways you’d never expect.

zh: 另外。
en: Beyond that, the program also invites Xue Zhaofeng, Professor of Economics to act as the “knowledge initiator” and works together with the “Dingdong Teaching Assistants” Du Haitao and Jin Mengjia, to discuss topics of youth with the live audience and create “Youth Public Lectures for All”.

zh: 香港特区政府政务司司长形势严峻，全力抗议中新网。
en: Chief Secretary for Administration of Hong Kong Special Administrative Region: all-out efforts to combat epidemic at critical juncture -Ecns.cn

zh: 新华社香港7月26日电香港特区政府政务司司长张建宗26日表示香港新官肺炎疫情形势持续严峻，若疫情转会特区政府将果断采取更严厉管制措施，进一步限制经营场所营业和减少市民外出空间。
en: HONG KONG, July 26 (Xinhua) -- Chief Secretary for Administration of Hong Kong Special Administrative Region Matthew Cheung Kin-chung said on July 26 that the situation of COVID-19 in Hong Kong continued to be severe, and if the epidemic turned worse, the HKSAR Government would decisively enact more stringent control measures to further restrict business operations and reduce the activity space for people.

zh: 但现阶段，特区政府无意推出居家令或禁租令，限制市民外出。
en: But at present, the SAR government has no intention to enact a "Stay-at-Home Order" or "Restriction Order" that restrict people from going out.

zh: 张建宗当日发表题为形势严峻全力抗议的网址。
en: Cheung Kin-chung published a weblog post on the same day entitled All-out efforts to combat epidemic at critical juncture.

zh: 他表示这一波疫情是半年以来最严峻的，未来两星期将会十分关键，要尽力防止病毒在社区进一步扩散。
en: He said the current wave of the outbreak was the most serious one over the past six months and the coming fortnight would be crucial in the fight against further spread of the coronavirus in the community.

zh: 除了特区政府采取必要措施之外，市民自律和配合也非常重要。
en: While the Government would take all necessary measures in this battle, it was equally important for the public to exercise self-discipline and cooperation.

zh: 他呼吁市民务必尽量留在家中，减少社交接触和外出用餐。
en: He earnestly urged members of the public to stay home as much as possible, minimize social contact, and refrain from dining out.

zh: 市民应配合佩戴口罩的强制措施，保护自己及他人，并注重个人和环境卫生及勤吸收，更应暂停，非必要的亲友聚会或聚餐即介绍到结束。
en: In compliance with the compulsory measures, citizens should wear a face mask to protect themselves and others while observing personal and environmental hygiene and washing their hands frequently, and should also suspend non-essential social or meal gatherings and reduce their visits to markets.

zh: 他表示中央一直十分关心香港疫情变化及支持特区政府方以抗议工作，并积极回应行政长官最新要求，再加大检测能力和改装亚洲国际博览馆，为类似方舱医院的工作上提供协助。
en: He emphasized that the Central Authorities had all along taken heed of the changes in Hong Kong’s epidemic situation and staunchly supported the anti-epidemic work of the HKSAR Government, and in response to the recent request of the Chief Executive, the Central Authorities offered timely assistance in enhancing the virus testing capacity and retrofitting AsiaWorld-Expo into a makeshift facility similar to the “mobile cabin hospital” on the Mainland.

zh: 张建宗表示特区政府为特定高风险群组及l原设计员设计护养院员工，餐厅员工出租车司机和物业管理员工提供的免费病毒检测已全面展开，涉及人数多达40万。
en: Meanwhile, he stated that the Government’s initiative to provide free COVID-19 testing for designated high-risk groups was running at full steam, which would cover some 400,000 persons including staff of residential care homes for the elderly (RCHEs), residential care homes for persons with disabilities, as well as nursing homes, restaurant workers, taxi drivers, and property management staff.

zh: 他十分关注出现在安老院舍的感染个案，特区政府亦为l院社员有安排特定的临时检疫中心。
en: He was very concerned about the recent emergence of local infection cases in RCHEs, so to meet such needs, the Government has arranged to set up designated temporary quarantine centers.

zh: 他表示特区政府正在位于新界大屿山的诸侯王，建议中心附近兴建隔离检疫设施，预计可在9月底前提供额外700套隔离房。
en: He also said that quarantine facilities were being built in the vicinity of Penny’s Bay Quarantine Center at Lantau Island, and 700 additional units were expected to be available by the end of September.

zh: 行政长官也在19日宣布，特区政府将在珠海外交易中心多兴建两千借隔离房，并争取于今年年底前落成。
en: The Chief Executive also announced on the 19th that the Government would build an additional 2,000 units at Penny’s Bay and strive to complete them by the end of this year.

zh: 加上该隔离检疫中心已经投入使用的800减一中心，预计可提供共3500个立方。
en: With the commissioning of 800 quarantine units constructed on the Government land, the total number of quarantine units provided at Penny’s Bay will add up to 3,500.

zh: 香港目前共有4个正在运作的各类交易中心，共提供约2600家隔离房。
en: Currently, a total of about 2,600 units are in operation under four quarantine centers in Hong Kong.

zh: 此外，特区政府于24日重新启用位于香港岛的鲤鱼门公园度假村作为社区隔离设施，用于10~50岁以下有独立自理能力的患者。
en: Besides, Lei Yue Mun Park and Holiday Village on Hong Kong Island has been converted into community isolation facilities since July 24 for COVID-19 patients who are under the age of 50 with self-care capabilities.

zh: 唱不当实行中国式的营养剂，中新网。
en: "Nutrients" for Implementing the History of the Party and New China-Ecns.cn

zh: 近日，习近平总书记在参观4平战役纪念馆时强调，要让14亿人民9000多万党员，特别是各级领导干部都很好学习，中国共产党，当时新中国是。
en: In recent days, General Secretary Xi Jinping said while visiting the Siping Battle Memorial Hall, “It is necessary for 1.4 billion people and more than 90 million party members, especially leading cadres at all levels, to learn the history of the Communist Party of China and the history of New China well. "

zh: 认真学习当时新中国实施党员干部不忘初心牢记使命的必修课，要从中汲取丰富滋养后指甲过清灰，走好新时代的长征路。
en: Studying the history of the Party and the history of New China is a compulsory course for party members and cadres to stay true to the original aspiration and founding mission; we should draw rich nourishment from history, build a strong sense of family and country, and walk the long march of the new era.

zh: 一部波澜壮阔的当时新中国史记录着中国共产党自诞生以来的艰苦奋斗和光辉历程，展示了共产党人用生命和鲜血铸就的信念与忠诚，永远接受的初心和使命。
en: The magnificent history of the Party and New China records the hard work and glorious history of the Communist Party of China since its founding, and demonstrates the faith and loyalty that the Communists have forged with their lives and blood, as well as the original aspiration and founding mission that they will always adhere to.

zh: 历史是最好的教科书，对于党员干部来说，当时新中国实施这一教科书中最璀璨的篇章。
en: History is the best textbook, and for members and cadres of the Party, the history of Party and New China are the brightest chapters in this textbook.

zh: 每一名党员干部都要不断强化以史为鉴，走向未来的历史思维，立足新征程，新使命结合时代的接力棒，走好当代人的长征路。
en: Every member and cadre of the Party must continuously strengthen their historical thinking of using history as a mirror and moving towards the future, based on the new journey and new mission, accept the "relay baton" of the times, and walk the long march of the new era.

zh: 医师祝婚在学习，当时新中国始终坚守初心使命。
en: We must cast the soul with history, and stick to the original mission in the study of the history of the Party and New China.

zh: Fact当时新中国是慢慢的，是中国共产党人永恒不变的初心使命和坚如磐石的信念，接受彰显出共产党人永远和人民在一起的质朴情怀。
en: Looking through the history of the Party and New China, we find it is full of the eternal and unchanging original aspiration and founding mission of the Chinese Communists and the adherence to rock-solid convictions, which demonstrates the simple desire of the Communists to walk with the people forever.

zh: 近距离去了解当时新中国时的重要事件，重要会议，重要任务，不仅是直观的心灵震撼相系里，更是从灵魂深处读懂初心信仰的内涵，直销使命担当的分量。
en: To understand important events, important meetings, and important figures in the history of the Party and New China up close is not only an intuitive baptism of thought, but also a deep understanding of the connotations of the original aspiration and the weight of the founding mission.

zh: 对于党员干部来说，想要不断滴滴出行使命永葆先进本色，就要从当时新中国始终找到我们出发的原点，出行的指点，保持清醒的认识和坚定的立场，激荡出为国为民奋勇拼搏的力量，确保革命先辈们用鲜血和生命打下的红色江山，代代相传。
en: For the Party members and cadres, if they want to continuously forge their original aspiration and founding mission and maintain their advanced qualities, they must find the starting point and the fulcrum of our original intention from the history of the Party and New China, maintain a clear understanding and a firm stand, and find the strength to fight bravely for the country and the people and ensure that the red world their revolutionary ancestors laid down with their blood and lives will be passed on from generation to generation.

zh: 确实明智在学习当时新中国始终传承崇高精神。
en: Studying history can make people wise, so we can inherit the noble spirit in the study of the history of the Party and New China.

zh: 自中国共产党成立后先后塑造了红船精神，井冈山精神，长征精神，延安精神，抗战精神，西柏坡精神，两弹一星精神，航天精神等一系列伟大精神。
en: Since the founding of the Communist Party of China, it has successively shaped a series of great spirits such as the Red Boat Spirit, the Jinggangshan Spirit, the Long March Spirit, the Yan'an Spirit, the Anti-Japanese War Spirit, the Xibaipo Spirit, the "Two Bombs and One Satellite" Spirit, and the Aerospace Spirit.

zh: 这些历史沉淀下的伟大精神，为我们党在前进道路上战胜各种风险挑战，提供了强有力的精神激励，是大矿抢不走的宝贵精神财富。
en: These great spirits precipitated by history have provided the Party with a powerful spiritual incentive to overcome various risks and challenges on the way forward, and are a precious spiritual wealth that cannot be defeated, washed away, or taken away.

zh: 学习当时中国诗的过程，是对这些精神重温和自我精神塑造的过程，要自绝于革命先辈的崇高精神为镜，坚守好共产党人的精神家园，为推进伟大事业实现伟大梦想，筑牢坚实的精神基座，并将这些精神继承和弘扬下去，焕发出新的时代光芒。
en: The process of studying the history of the Party and China is a process of reviewing these spirits and shaping one's own spirit; we must conscientiously use the lofty spirit of the revolutionary ancestors as a mirror, stay true to the spiritual home of the Communists, and lay a solid spiritual foundation for advancing the great cause and realizing the great dream, and we should also inherit and carry forward these spirits, and make them glow with the light of the new era.

zh: 都十字星在学习，当时新中国始终不断。
en: Reading history can make people reflect; we must continue to preserve righteousness and dispel evil in the study of the history of the Party and New China, .

zh: 对于党员干部来说，从没有任何一段历史能够比当时新中国时带来更加深刻的警示提示与借鉴。
en: For Party members and cadres, there has never been any history that can deliver more profound warning, enlightenment, and reference than the history of the Party and New China.

zh: 在当时新中国史中，既能看到老一辈革命家立志献身信仰者，不能为实现既定目标奋斗的伟大事迹，又能看到某些人物理想信念，动摇走到革命对里面的深刻教训和警示，我们以坚定的决心和意志永不停止，永不懈怠，始终保有充沛顽强的斗争精神，不断纯洁党性，修身律己。
en: In the history of the Party and New China, we can see the great deeds of the older generation of revolutionaries who were determined to devote themselves to their faith and persevere in striving to achieve the established goals, but we also see the profound lessons of certain figures who were shaken in their ideals and beliefs and came to the opposite side of the revolution, which enlighten and warn us never to stop or slack off in our firm determination and will, always maintain a strong fighting spirit, continuously purify the spirit of the Party, and be self-disciplined.

zh: 想要真正成为一名共产主义远大理想的坚定信仰者，忠实实践者需要夫妻私享汇城，验房吾够ration。当时新中国是应成为每一名党员干部，坚持自我就是自我的一句。
en: To truly become a firm believer and loyal practitioner of the lofty ideals of communism, one needs to clean off ideological “dust” and guard against “dirt”; the history of the Party and New China should become the basis for every Party member and cadre to examine and warn himself.

zh: 只是立志在学习，当时新中国始终有条时代重任。
en: Knowing history can inspire people; we should bravely take on the important tasks of the times in the study of the history of the Party and New China.

zh: 习近平总书记曾指出学习党史国史是坚持和发展中国特色社会主义，把党和国家各项事业继续推向前进的必修课。
en: General Secretary Xi Jinping once pointed out, "Learning the history of the Party and the country is a compulsory course for upholding and developing socialism with Chinese characteristics and continuing to advance the various undertakings of the Party and the country. "

zh: 回望历史，叩问出行，为的是赓续光荣，走向未来。
en: Looking back at history and seeking our original aspirations allows us to maintain our glory and move towards a bright future.

zh: 每一名党员干部都应当把学习当实行，中国式作为一种终身追求，在学习中不断摆正人生航向，在各自工作岗位上用的历史使命，敢于担当负责，积极主动作为。
en: Every Party member and cadre should adopt the study of the history of the Party and New China as lifelong pursuit, constantly set the course of life in their studies, and bravely assume the historical mission, dare to assume responsibility, and act proactively in our respective jobs.

zh: 坚持以老一辈革命家的先进事迹为参照和指引，不断擦亮共产党人的政治本色，保持着奋发有为的奋斗姿态和越是艰险越向前的斗争精神，在中华民族伟大复兴的好的征程中书写属于自己的灿烂一笔。
en: We should adhere to the reference and guidance of the advanced deeds of the older generation of revolutionaries, constantly refine the political nature of the communists, maintain the attitude of struggle in seizing the day and making every effort, and the spirit of struggle in spite of the difficulties and hardships; in the great journey of the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation, we must write a brilliant stroke of our own.

zh: 塞上江南，追寻诗意，黄河孟中新网。
en: “The Great Wall of Jiangnan”, seeking the poetry of the “Yellow River Dream” - chinanews.com

zh: 中国结编故事，塞上江南，追寻诗意黄河梦。
en: (China poverty reduction story) “The Great Wall in Jiangnan”, seeking the poetry of the “Yellow River Dream”

zh: 中新社internet7月26日电压低。九曲黄河万里沙，浪淘风簸自天涯。
en: China News Service, Yinchuan, reported July 26 (Yang Di) “Countless li of sands along the Yellow River’s endless turns as waves and wind rush onward from the horizon. “

zh: 及其无数文人斥资外长好清的黄河，孕育了美丽富饶的宁夏平原，如今拥有塞上江南美称的宁夏，正坚持生态优先，绿色发展理念，追寻着诗意的黄河梦。
en: The Yellow River, which has inspired the passions of countless poets, birthed the beautiful and bountiful Ningxia Plain, and today, Ningxia, which bears the fond epithet “The Great Wall of Jiangnan”, upholds the concept of “environment first, green development” as it pursues the poetry of the “Yellow River Dream”.

zh: 河清水秀的博梦。
en: The “Jade Dream” of clear river water

zh: 天下黄河富宁夏，黄河流经宁夏，397公里是养育一方的母亲河。
