en: According to Zhang Yi, Director of the Population and Employment Statistics Division of National Bureau of Statistics, all employment policies continued to be effective in the second quarter; labor that retreated earlier due to the outbreak is returning gradually, and in June, the urban labor participation rate increased around 10 points compared to February, close to that of the same period last year.

zh: 数据显示6月份城镇就业总量较2月份增长超过19%，多数行业达到异形前水平企业就业人员周平均工作时间达46.8小时比2月份提高6.6小时，比1月份略高0.1小时。
en: As data shows, the total urban employment in June increased 19% compared to February, with many industries bouncing back to pre-pandemic levels; average weekly working hours of company employees reached 46.8 hours, 6.6 hours higher than in February, and 0.1 hours higher than in January.

zh: 物价同样关系着千家万户。
en: Commodity prices are also relevant for families.

zh: 今年1月份英文同比涨幅为5.4%，创下了多年来新高。
en: In January, CPI increased 5.4% year on year, a record high in many years.

zh: 进入2月份，英文同比涨幅虽然略有回落，但仍处于5区间。
en: In February, year-on-year CPI dropped slighted, but was still above 5%.

zh: 英文同比涨幅处于高位，绩优春节前消费需求拉动因素也有春节错月和同比基数较低因素。
en: High level year-on-year CPI growth was driven by consumer demand before Spring Festival, but even with Spring Festival demand, it fell by month and was lower on a year-on-year base.

zh: 不过新官肺炎疫情对物价的影响尤为明显。
en: However, COVID-19 had an obvious impact on commodity prices.

zh: 受疫情防控影响，一二月份全国各地均出现物流演示，物资供应不及时，物资运输成本增加等状况，加之一些市民春季抢购部分生活必需品价格明显上涨。
en: Affected by pandemic prevention and control, delays in logistics and supplies, increases in transportation costs occurred across the country in January and February; also, as some people rushed to hoard, the prices of some daily necessities went up.

zh: 为应对疫情防控给物价形势带来的扰动，有关部门，把重要工作物资纳入应急运输保障范围，确保物资运输畅通。
en: In response to disturbances in commodity prices from pandemic prevention and control, the relevant authorities put major daily supplies in emergency circulation to ensure unblocked supply.

zh: 在一系列政策举措的作用下，蔬菜瓜果市场供给得到有力保障。
en: Through a series of policies and measures, the market supply of vegetables and fruit was secured.

zh: 为应对今年年初猪肉价格快速上涨情况，中央出台保供稳价政策后，各地区各部门迅速贯彻落实猪肉储备投放，供应明显改善，生猪产能有序恢复，产销秩序逐渐正常。
en: In response to the sharp rise in pork price at the beginning of the year, the central government rolled out policies to maintain prices and supply, and regions and departments swiftly implemented them accordingly; as a result, the pork reserve supply obviously improved, capacity in pigs for slaughter was restored in an orderly manner, and order in production and sales gradually returned to normal.

zh: 3月份起猪肉价格连续下降，5月份带动食品价格同比涨幅回落至10.6%，6月份受生猪出栏减缓，进口量减少和团体消费需求回升等因素影响，猪肉价格环比略有上涨。
en: Since March, pork prices have been dropping continuously, leading food prices to fall back to a 10.6% year-on-year increase in May; in June, affected by slowed output of pigs for slaughter, reduced imports, and recovered group consumption, pork prices saw slight month-on-month growth.

zh: 咸菜价格季节性变动特征明显，上半年平均上涨3.4%。
en: Seasonal changes in fresh vegetable prices were clear, with an average of 3.4% growth in the first half.

zh: 受去年同期对比基数较高，影响全国价格同比持续下降，上半年平均下降13.3%。
en: Due to a high year-on-year starting point last year, fresh fruit saw continuous drop in year-on-year prices, with an average 13.3% drop in the first half.

zh: 群众基本生活得到有效保障，经济社会大局保持稳定有序。
en: With people’s essential everyday needs effectively secured, the overall economic and social order was kept stable.

zh: 随着交通物流逐渐恢复，各地加大招工力度，市场供需状况好转。
en: As transportation and logistics gradually returned to normal, regions reinforced supply guarantee measures, and market demand and supply took a turn for the better.

zh: 3月份开始英文环比连续4个月下降，同比涨幅也有3月份的4.3%，回落到6月份的2.5%，物价水平总体恢复平稳。
en: Since March, month-on-month CPI dropped for 4 consecutive months, year-on-year growth fell back to 2.5% in June from 4.3% in March, and overall commodity prices have stabilized.

zh: 下半年我国物价将继续保持温和水平，总体通胀压力不大，但仍然要在做好疫情防控常态化的前提下，推动恢复生产生活秩序。
en: In the next half of the year, commodity prices in the country will continue to maintain at a moderate level, with no significant inflation pressure overall, however, we still need to facilitate restoring the order of production and living with the premise of regular outbreak prevention and control.

zh: 有效应对粮食果蔬等农产品主产区洪涝干旱等自然灾害加强市场监管，坚决打击囤积居奇，哄抬物价等扰乱市场秩序行为。
en: Natural disasters like flood and drought in major agricultural production regions of crops, vegetables, and fruit must be dealt with efficiently, market supervision and regulation must be reinforced to sternly crack down regrading and price-gouging behaviors that disturb market order.

zh: 马云被印度法院传唤。
en: Jack Ma Summoned by an Indian Court?

zh: 阿里官方回应菲尔发出中新网。
en: Alibaba: The So-called Official Response Was not Issued by the Official Website of Alibaba-Ecns.cn

zh: 网传官方回应，非案例方面发出。
en: Alibaba: The so-called official response was not issued by the official website of Alibaba

zh: 中新经纬客户端，7月26日电26日下午有外媒报道，称印度首都新德里的一家法院，以7000雇员诉讼案，对印度阿里巴巴创始人马云和其他十几家公司高官等作出传话。
en: July 26 (Economic News Client) On the afternoon of 26th, foreign media reported that a court in New Delhi, the capital of India, had summoned the founder of UC India and Alibaba, Jack Ma, and the executives of more than a dozen other companies in the matter of a lawsuit by a former employee.

zh: 对此，阿里巴巴市场公关委员会主席王帅在朋友圈幽默留言表示英文印度公司正按流程处理，但至于马云本人知不知道王帅称我也不清楚。
en: Regarding this, Wang Shuai, chairman of the Alibaba Market Public Relations Committee, left a humorous message in Moments, saying that UC India is handling the matter according to its processes, but as to whether Jack Ma knows the truth himself, Wang Shuai said, "I don't know either.

zh: 他退休后确实越来越难找了，我都找了一天了，今晚再去英文酒吧找找看。
en: It is indeed getting harder and harder to find him after his retirement... I have been looking for him all day... I will go to the HHB bar again tonight. "

zh: 另一方面，向中新经纬客户端证实，此前网传所谓安利官方回复英文，一直坚定地致力于服务印度市场和保护本地员工的福利，政策符合当地法律。
en: In addition, Alibaba confirmed to Economic News that the so-called official reply which was previously issued on the Internet, “UC has always been firmly committed to serving the Indian market and protecting the welfare of local employees, and our policies comply with local laws.

zh: 因为这件事还在审判中，无法对这个问题做进一步讨论。
en: Because the trial regarding this matter is still ongoing, we can't comment further on this issue," "

zh: 并非阿里方面发出。
en: was not issued by Alibaba.

zh: 麦当劳将在全美国超14,000家门店，要求顾客必须戴口罩。
en: McDonald's: Over 14,000 restaurants across the US will require customers to wear masks

zh: 应对相关肺炎疫情，美国麦当劳24日发布声明表示，全美麦当劳门市自8月1日起规定顾客入内必须佩戴口罩，并会在入口处提供口罩给没有携带的客人。
en: In response to the COVID-19 pandemic, McDonald's in the United States issued a statement on July 24th, saying that all its stores across the US would require customers to wear masks upon entry from August 1st and would provide masks at the entrance for customers who do not have one.

zh: 据美国全国公共广播电台英文24日报道，麦当劳在全美门店超过14,000家。
en: According to a news report from National Public Radio (NPR) on July 24th, McDonald's has more than 14,000 restaurants in the United States.

zh: 麦当劳向媒体透露不愿戴口罩的顾客将被引导至与其他客户保持安全距离的外卖领取点。
en: McDonald's told the media that customers who were unwilling to wear a mask would be directed to a takeaway pick-up point to maintain a safe distance between them and other customers.

zh: 此外，麦当劳餐厅堂食区还将增设防护板，以保持社交隔离。
en: In addition, additional shielding panels would be installed in dine-in areas to maintain social distance.

zh: 麦当劳因此推出新的佩戴口罩，规定以应对不愿配合的顾客。
en: In this, McDonald's has issued a new mask rule to deal with uncooperative customers.

zh: 乌市余部剧目将陆续登场，井研集团文具厂复工做好准备，新华网。
en: Over Fifty Works of Art will be on Display as the Beijing Performance & Arts Group Has Fully Prepared for the Resumption of Theatre - Xinhua Net

zh: 伴随北京突发公共卫生应急响应级别由二级调整为三级，形成营业性文化场所迎来限流恢复开放。
en: With the adjustment of the public health emergency response level in Beijing down to Level III from Level II, cultural venues in Beijing are allowed to re-open with a limited number of visitors.

zh: 北京演艺集团透露一位剧场开放，做好充分准备，将有50余部剧目准备陆续等场。
en: According to the Beijing Performance & Arts Group, it has made full preparation for the re-opening of the theaters, with more than 50 works of art that will be on display.

zh: 今天金业集团线上演出品牌经验剧场也将上线。
en: Today, its online display brand, Beijing Performance & Arts Theater, will also start its own business.

zh: 一星期精英集团旗下乐团停演不停，一停工不停工储备卡座。
en: During the pandemic, troupes under the group “stopped its shows but never ended its ‘art’, stopped their work but never quit ‘practicing’”, and have prepared dazzling works of art for the future.

zh: 中国杂技团将推出魅影天地宝藏未来之星的梦三部全新剧目，融合秋季芭蕾对手顶等三大该花系控住，的确等精彩绝伦的花样杂技表演节目。
en: The Chinese Acrobatic Troupe will launch three new works: Phantom of Acrobatics, Treasures of Heaven and Earth, and Dream of Future Stars, which integrate multiple acrobatic shows including ball skills, ballet pairs, umbrella-twirling, single bar gymnastics, comedy, diabolo, floor spinning, and more.

zh: 中国评剧院65载璀璨历史，清廉亚运，再创辉煌演出即将拉开帷幕，届时老中青三代戏骨将同台献艺，共同见证和庆祝建院65周年的辉煌时刻。
en: Chinese Pingju Theater’s performance season “A Splendid 65 years, More Wondrous Elegance” is approaching, in which competing actors of different ages will perform on the same stage, jointly bearing witness to and celebrating the wonderful moments of its 65th anniversary.

zh: 据悉，中国评剧院现有大戏剧目储备3是不这次74处其中包括华为母亲两小唱的彩虹无双传，心挺累的。
en: According to reports, there are 30 works to be shown at the Chinese Pingju Theatre, alongside with 14 opera highlights, which include Flower is a Go-between, Mother, Enjoyable Light, Rainbow in Tibet, Project Gutenberg, and Tears in the New Pavilion.

zh: 深受小观众喜爱的北京儿童艺术剧院和中国木偶剧院，也纷纷拿出看家本领，等待着与小朋友再次相聚。
en: The Beijing Theatre for Children and the Chinese Puppet Theatre, which are deeply beloved by children, also used their “core” competitiveness”, to await their reunion with children.

zh: 中国木偶剧院正紧锣密鼓的准备大型原创木偶剧长城和大型卡通舞台剧，熊猫和小鼹鼠，垃圾分类知识环保小卫士。
en: Chinese Puppet Theatre is busy with the large original puppet show The Long Great Wall and the large cartoon stage show Panda and Mole’s Waste Classification Environmental Protector.

zh: 北京儿童艺术剧院酝酿已久的小剧场话剧，14天已经完成剧本创作，开始进入排练阶段，计划8月低，经典英文剧你看起来好像很好吃，将于10月至12月在12个城市开展巡演。
en: The stage play Fourteen Days from the Beijing Theatre for Children, which has long been in preparation, is now finished with its script writing and is in rehearsal, and is projected to give its first show by the end of August; the classic IP You Seems to Be Tasty will tour 12 cities from October to December.

zh: 北京歌剧舞剧院也在有条不紊的进行万马奔腾等10个精品小型舞蹈和新时代之歌，北京之恋爱的桥梁等经典歌曲的腐败工作。
en: The Beijing Dance and Opera Theatre is also rehearsing its 10 small dance shows including Chasing the Dream, Galloping Horses, and bringing back rehearsals of classical songs such as The Song of the New Era, Love in Beijing, and Bridge of Love.

zh: 值得一提的是，将在年底上演的惊艳集团年度力作音乐剧，在远方也在井井有条的开展排练工作。
en: One thing worth mention is that the annual masterpiece of Beijing Performance & Arts Group, the musical play In the Distance, is also in regular rehearsal.

zh: 北京民族乐团，北京市河北梆子剧团，北京市曲剧团和北京曲艺团，也都有诸多好戏佳作，等待剧场开门之日上演。
en: The Beijing National Orchestra, Beijing Bangzi Troupe, Beijing Opera Troupe, and Beijing Traditional Folk Arts Troupe also have many masterpieces planned for “resumption day”.

zh: 继5月推出首届线上演出季之后，惊艳集团整合旗下九家院团优质演艺资源打造的线上演出品牌，惊艳剧场，今日正式上线。
en: After launching its first online performance season in May, the Beijing Performance & Arts Group is now integrating the best resources of its nine troupes to build an online performance brand, “Beijing Performance & Arts Theatre”, which will be available today.

zh: 京剧剧场旨在达到艺术品类最齐全的全天候网络，剧场其中既有肌院团优秀经典节目的线上惠民演出季，还有名家说戏经典回放，云端微课堂，经验游戏相伴荮物等不同板块。
en: It aims to build a 24-hour online theatre with the most comprehensive types of art, including an “online reciprocal performance season” which displays its extraordinary and classical shows, and other different modules such as “Comments of Masters - Playback of Classics”, “Cloud Micro Classroom”, and “Shows to Accompany Your Fridays”.

zh: 今天北京民族乐团将作为首位嘉宾亮相惊艳剧场，为观众带来一场既充满创意又不乏情怀的郭超弹幕音乐会。
en: Today, the Beijing National Orchestra will be the first “guest” at the theatre, giving a creative and charming concert with the title of Fashion of the Nation.

zh: 各部门积极落实防汛措施，确保运输安全中新网。
en: Sectors Actively Implementing Flood Control Measures to Assure Transportation Safety-ChinaNews.com

zh: 新华社北京7月26日电记者分析入夏以来我国多地遭受强降雨侵袭。
en: Xinhua News Agency, Bejing, July 26 (reported by Fan Xi) Since the start of summer, multiple regions in China have been suffering from heavy rainfall.

zh: 为做好暑运防汛和运输安全工作，各部门坚守岗位，加强隐患排查整治，强化应急处置，全面落实各项防汛措施。
en: To carry out flood control and transportation safety work for summer transportation, all sectors shall hold their positions, enhance inspection and remediation, and reinforce emergency response to implement flood control measures comprehensively.

zh: 来自中国国家铁路集团有限公司的最新统计显示铁路部门已累计出动检查人员28万余人次，排查桥梁9万，余座隧道1.7万余座，涵洞24万余座。
en: As the latest statistics from China Railway indicate, the railway system has dispatched 280,000 in-person inspections, inspected over 90,000 bridges, 17,000 tunnels, and 240,000 culverts.

zh: 7月1日以来，全国铁路主要干线和货运通道保持安全通畅，总体运输秩序良好，跨铁路局直通旅客列车施法运行，到达正点率分别达到97.7%，87.1%，86.8%。
en: Since July 1, national transportation has been running in a generally orderly manner, with major railway arteries and cargo channels maintaining safe and smooth operation, and with on-schedule rate for cross-region passenger trains at departure, en route, and arrival at 97.7%, 87.1%, and 86.8%, respectively.

zh: 中国铁路南昌局集团有限公司调度所强化应急处置，指定专人负责动态跟踪掌握防洪机具，物料储备和存放情况与突发灾害故障，迅速通报信息，启动应急响应。
en: The dispatching office of the China Railway Nanchang Bureau Group has enhanced its emergency response, and has designated personnel for tracking reserves and storage status of flood control equipment, tools, and materials so that when emergency disasters or failures occur, communication and emergency responses can be launched quickly.

zh: 近期面对强降雨导致上游形成堰塞湖，对亿万铁路清江大桥造成的安全威胁，中国铁路武汉局集团有限公司一厂综合维修段，组织专业技术人员24小时监控清江大桥，并与当地应急部门建立全天候沟通机制，及时掌握和处理险情隐患。
en: Lately, a barrier lake on the upper stream formed by heavy rainfall has posed a safety hazard to Qingjiang Bridge on the Yichang-Wanzhou Railway, so the Yichang comprehensive maintenance team of China Railway Wuhan Bureau Group deployed specialists to monitor Qingjiang Bridge around the clock and established a 24/7 communication mechanism with local emergency departments to obtain information and deal with potential risks in time.

zh: 为确保夏季运输用电安全，国网青岛市即墨区供电公司结合汛期气候特点，与当地气象铁路部门密切合作，加强辖区内铁路供电线路和设施设备巡视和隐患排查，强化线路走廊出现山体滑坡，塌陷你是留等相关事故的应急处置。
en: To ensure electric safety during summer transportation, in consideration of the climate features during the flood season, the State Grid Qingdao Jimo District Power Supply Company established close collaboration with local meteorology and railway authorities to enhance inspection of railway power lines and equipment, as well as to reinforce emergency response to landslides, subsidence, debris flow, and similar along the power line corridor.

zh: 为进一步做好防汛防台工作，东方航空技术有限公司成立应急抢险预备队，开展防汛防灾知识培训，并根据每日天气和台风等预警情况，制定航班计划，对沿海地区停场飞机，做好运行恢复前的准备工作和相应应急预案。
en: To further implement flood and typhoon control measures, Eastern Airlines Technology is setting up a emergency rescue reserve team, conducting training on flood and disaster prevention, making flight schedules based on daily weather conditions and typhoon alerts, as well as developing preparations and emergency plans for grounded planes in coastal areas before resuming operation.

zh: 新书爆料，哈利王子觉得哥哥是李傲曼。
en: Explosive allegation in new book: Prince Harry thinks his older brother is “snobbish and arrogant”

zh: 英国泰晤士报和星期日泰晤士报连载名为寻找自由的新书，内容描绘哈利王子英文与妻子Megan英文的王室生活心路历程。
en: UK newspapers The Times and The Sunday Times are serializing a new book called “Finding Freedom”, which describes the royal life and experiences of Prince Harry and his wife Meghan Markle.

zh: 但路透社报道，哈利和Megan一和这本书撇清关系说他们未接受作者访问，也未提供任何内容。
en: However, according to a report from Reuters, Harry and Meghan have disassociated themselves from the book, claiming that they refused to be interviewed by the author and did not provide any content for it.

zh: 星期日泰晤士报报道，新书引述消息人士表示哈利和Megan婚前约会时，威廉王子英文想确认原是好莱坞女性的美，更对哈利是否别有用心。
en: The Sunday Times reports that the new book quotes sources who claim that before their marriage, when Meghan and Harry were dating, Prince William wanted to confirm that Meghan, at the time a Hollywood actress, had no ulterior motives in marrying Harry.

zh: 根据消息人士转述，威廉当时曾对哈利说，你别感觉有必要仓促去买根。
en: One of the sources described William saying to Harry at the time, “Don’t let yourself be rushed (into marrying Meghan).

zh: 你可以尽量花时间去了解这个女孩。
en: Take as much time as you can to get to know this girl. “

zh: 报道说，当哈利听到威廉用这个女孩形容Megan，她从各个语气中感受到傲慢势力，他也认为自己不再需要他人照顾提醒。
en: The report states that when Harry heard William describe Meghan as “this girl”, he thought his brother’s words were arrogant and snobbish, and that he felt he no longer needed to consider the opinions of others in the matter.

zh: 哈利和Megan今年一月宣布计划个更独立的生活，并将自食其力。
en: In January of this year, Harry and Meghan announced their plans to live a more independent life and support themselves economically.

zh: 两人3月正式卸下王室高级成员身份后，目前带着儿子亚琪住在美国洛杉矶，追求新事业。
en: In March, the couple formally renounced their status as high-ranking members of the royal family, and at present they live in Los Angeles with their son Archie, where they are pursuing new careers.

zh: 哈利和Megan在2018年5月结婚。
en: Harry and Meghan were married in May of 2018.

zh: 当时这场婚姻被视为为英国王室注入好莱坞的光鲜亮丽和新时代气息，两人也因此成为当代全球最受瞩目的名人夫妻档之一。
en: At the time, the marriage was seen as a way to bring Hollywood glamor and new energy into the British royal family, making the pair one of the world’s most prominent and scrutinized celebrity couples.

zh: 带伞。
en: Take an Umbrella with You!

zh: 近日北京雨水来退烧，最高气温降至29℃，新华网。
en: Beijing's Highest Temperature Drops to 29℃ as the Rain Comes to 'Reduce the Fever' - Xinhua

zh: 今天7月26日降雨将再次光临京城，最高气温也会降至29℃，提醒公众外出注意携带雨具，注意交通安全。
en: (July 26) On July 26, it rained again in Beijing, and the highest temperature dropped to 29℃, so the public should carry the rain gear and pay attention to traffic safety when going out.

zh: 昨天北京天空云量较多，午后城区大部分地区的最高气温都超过了33℃，切实杜绝前几天有所增加闷热感提升。
en: Yesterday, it was cloudy in Beijing, and the highest temperature in most parts of the city exceeded 33℃ in the afternoon, while the humidity increased compared with the previous days, and strengthening the sultry feeling .

zh: 伴随着冷空气的到来，降雨将再度光临京城。
en: Along with the arrival of the cold air, it will rain again in Beijing.

zh: 预计今天白天北京INT，多云有分散性降雨伴有弱雷电，南风二三间四级，最高气温29℃，夜间阴有小到中雨，伴有弱雷电，南转北风一，二级最低气温23℃。
en: It is estimated that during the day, Beijing will be cloudy with scattered showers (accompanied by weak thunder and lightning), the south wind will be between Level 2-Level 4, and the highest temperature will be 29℃; at night, it will be cloudy with light to moderate rain (accompanied by weak thunder and lightning), and the south wind will change to north wind at Level 1-2, and the lowest temperature will be 23℃.

zh: 明天北京仍会有雷阵雨天气，最高气温30℃。
en: Tomorrow, there will still be thunderstorms in Beijing, with a high temperature of 30 ℃.

zh: 专家提醒，今明两天多阴雨天气，外出携带雨具，注意防雷避雨和交通安全，尽量避免山区活动，防范地质灾害。
en: Experts reminded us that it will be rainy today and tomorrow, so residents need to take rain gear when going out, pay attention to lightning protection, rain shelter, and traffic safety, and avoid mountain activities to avoid geology hazards.

zh: 黑龙江开展冒用知名医院名称清理整治专项行动中新网。
en: Heilongjiang Launched a Special Rectification Campaign Targeting the Fraudulent Use of Famed Hospital Names - China News

zh: 近年来一些医疗机构名称出现不规范不适宜问题，在未经依法授权的情况下擅自冒用知名医疗机构名称，对人民群众看病就医造成误导。
en: In recent years, some medical institutions name themselves in a nonstandard and inappropriate manner, or use the names of famed medical institutions without authorization according to the law, delivering misinformation to people when they seek medical treatment.

zh: 经查询国家企业信用信息公示系统，黑龙江省已登记注册的医疗机构名称中有部分出现协和等知名医疗机构字样，并利用协和等知名医院名义对外开展经营，扰乱了正常医疗秩序，造成恶劣社会影响。
en: After checking the National Enterprise Credit Information Publicity System, some registered medical institutions in Heilongjiang Province have the same Chinese words in their names as Peking Union Medical College Hospital (“Xie He”) and other well-known medical institutions, which carry out business under this disguise, disrupting the normal medical order and causing a devastating social impact.

zh: 与此同时，将以此为契机开展形式多样的普法宣传活动，提高市场主体责任意识，依法维权意识和守法经营意识。
en: At the same time, Heilongjiang will use this as an opportunity to raise awareness of responsibility among market entities through various publicity activities, focusing on the consciousness of rights safeguarding according to law and the awareness of law-abiding operations.

zh: 通过畅通投诉举报渠道，向社会公开曝光一批影响恶劣的典型案例，形成震慑效应。
en: By opening up channels for complaints and reports, a number of typical cases with bad effects will be revealed to the society to create a deterrent effect.

zh: 30个电竞项目落户上海浦东拓展再现新经济新赛道新华网。
en: With 30 E-sports Projects Launched, Pudong, Shanghai Expands the "New Track" of the Online New Economy - XinhuaNet

zh: 新华社上海7月25日电记者张佳妮，24日30个重点店项目落地，上海浦东新区，从场馆赛事到企业，涵盖电信企业发展全门类，预计带动区域电竞游戏产业新增北医院应收。
en: Shanghai, July 25 (Xinhua, Teng Jiani) On July 24, a total of 30 major E-sports projects were launched in Pudong New Area of Shanghai, covering all categories of E-sports industry development, covering venues, events, and enterprises, which are expected to boost the regional E-sports game industry by RMB 10 billion.

zh: 以电竞游戏为代表的数字文化产业，将成为浦东在新经济新的增长点助力上海打造全球电竞之都。
en: The digital culture industry, represented by E-sports games, will become a new growth point for Pudong's online new economy and help Shanghai build itself into a global E-sports capital.

zh: 电竞场馆方面的美本文化中心，东方体育中心等顶级赛事场馆基础上，包括问题融合场馆，浦东足球场，专业电竞，空间景观，以及东厂一空间等新一批场馆确认落地浦东。
en: In terms of the E-sports venues, on the basis of existing top-level venues such as the Mercedes-Benz Arena and the Oriental Sports Center, a new group of venues including the Pudong Football Stadium, a cultural and sports integration venue, Sunland E-sports Hall, a professional E-sports space, and the ESA Space have been confirmed to be launched in Pudong.

zh: 上海外高桥集团深蓝置地总经理王海松告诉记者，尽管约1500平方米的室内场馆，可以容纳1000人，目前正在建设中，预计明年3月引进赛事，电信官方将配建12万平方米绿化公园，结合电竞泛娱乐业态，引进动漫，二次元等娱乐元素。
en: Wang Haisong, general manager of Shanghai Waigaoqiao Free Trade Zone Group Sunland Real Estate, told reporters that the roughly 1,500 square meter indoor stadium of the Sunland E-sports Hall, currently under construction, could accommodate 1,000 people, is expected to start hosing events in March next year, and the E-sports Hall will be equipped with a green park of 120,000 square meters, which will include entertainment elements such as animation in combination with the E-sports pan-entertainment business.

zh: 电信配套产业方面，浦东着力完善产业链布局。
en: In terms of E-sports supporting industries, Pudong has made great efforts to improve its industry chain offerings.

zh: 网易龙之队等世界冠军战队，在签约活动上落户亮相，全国唯一的游戏电影电视数字频道，游戏风云一是浦东发展。
en: The NetEase Dragons and other world champion teams made their debut at the signing ceremony, and Gamefy, the only game E-sports TV digital channel in China, moved to Pudong for development.

zh: 3是方面浦东积极争取，国际国内顶级赛事落地，打造不落幕的电竞赛季。
en: In terms of events, Pudong actively strives to land top international and domestic events to create an endless E-sports season.

zh: 2020和平精英国际冠军杯，技嘉电竞等一批电竞赛事宣布在浦东举办。
en: A number of E-sports events such as the 2020 PEC and eLaLiga Santander were announced to be held in Pudong.

zh: 企业方面，浦东着重推动头部企业落地。
en: In terms of enterprises, Pudong focuses on promoting the landing of leading enterprises.

zh: 入党员信息计划在浦东陆续推出数10款游戏产品，网易，暴雪完美世界社区游戏等也将积极推出新的项目，争取形成北约及应收。
en: For example, Nayuaninfo plans to launch dozens of game products in Pudong, and NetEase Blizzard, Perfect World, Shengqu Games, and other enterprises will also actively launch new projects, striving to generate revenue of tens of billions of RMB .

zh: 统计显示当前普通的电竞游戏产业规模占到上海的1/3。
en: Statistics show that the current scale of Pudong's E-sports game industry accounts for one third of that of Shanghai.

zh: 腾讯，网易等一批电竞游戏偷不起落地，不懂英文就王者荣耀，冬季赛等一批顶级赛事，在互动举办，正在成为上海电信产业发展的强心脏。
en: A number of leading e-sports enterprises, such as Tencent and NetEase, have settled in Pudong, and a number of top competitions, such as TI9 and the Honor of Kings WinterChampion Cup, have been held in Pudong, which is becoming the "strong heart" of Shanghai’s E-sports industry development.

zh: 优质电竞产业在浦东的集聚也离不开相关政策的扶持。
en: The agglomeration of high-quality E-sports industry actors in Pudong is also inseparable from the support of relevant policies.

zh: 近期中国游戏产业研究院落地浦东，为业界制定高标准规范。
en: Recently, the Chinese Game Industry Research Institute was set up in Pudong to establish high standards for the industry.

zh: 浦东的群星职校被授牌为上海市职业教育电子竞技专业试点学校，为电竞产业人才培养奠定基础。
en: The Qunxing Vocational School in Pudong has been named a "Shanghai Vocational Education E-sports Professional Pilot School", laying the foundation for E-sports industry talent training.

zh: 电竞运动员注册制律，现在不懂落地，进一步提高奠定学生的职业化水平。
en: The registration system for E-sports players was first implemented in Pudong, which further improves professionalism among E-sports players.

zh: 浦东新区问题旅游局局长黄伟表示围绕上海打造全球电信制度的目标，提出建设上海电信产业发展核心功能区。
en: Huang Wei, director of the Culture, Sports, and Tourism Bureau of Pudong New Area, said that Pudong proposed building a "Shanghai E-sports industry development core functional area" to make Shanghai the "global capital of E-sports".

zh: 下一步活动将继续聚集重点赛事，重点企业，加快发展并形成产业链条。
en: In its next steps, Pudong will continue to focus on key sports events and enterprises to accelerate the development and form an industrial chain.

zh: 利用上海自贸试验区的政策为提升电竞产业总体发展显示，探索创新，形成可复制可推广的经验。
en: With the Shanghai Pilot Free Trade Zone policy, Pudong will try and innovate in order to promote the overall development of E-sports industry and form a replicable and propagable experience.

zh: 首都机场明天迎已经后，首批观众新华网。
en: Capital Theater receives first post-pandemic audience tomorrow - Xinhuanet

zh: 北京人艺将于明天下午2点推出经典作品，推销员之死剧本朗读在首都剧场迎来久违的观众。
en: Beijing People's Art Theatre will hold a script reading of “Death of a Salesman” tomorrow at 2:00 p.m., marking the first time in a long time that a live audience will be welcomed at Capital Theater.

zh: 在坚持常态防控有序开放预约限流的前提下，北京人艺将严格执行人员预约限流措施，确保总观众人数不超过剧场座位数的30%，保障观众间隔就座并保持一米以上距离。
en: Under the preconditions of “upholding normal prevention and control measures, opening in an orderly fashion, and reservations to restrict visitation”, Beijing People's Art Theatre will implement a strict reservation system to limit crowds and ensure that the total audience in attendance is not more than 30% of the theater’s total capacity and that all viewers are seated at least 1 meter apart.

zh: 同时剧场在日常之手清洁消毒监测登记，垃圾清理，场地巡查，安全管理等方面，也做好了充分准备。
en: At the same time, the theater is fully prepared for tasks such as daily attendance, cleaning and disinfection, testing and registration, garbage cleanup, site inspections, and safety management.

zh: 本次活动仅对持有人艺之友联谊会实体会员卡的观众开放电话，订票线路要求每人限定一张静脉位置。
en: Tickets for this event are limited to holders of physical “Friends of People's Art Theatre” membership card holders who reserve by phone, and due to capacity restrictions, each person may only reserve one ticket until reservation capacity is reached.

zh: 活动采取实名制订票入场，演出当天订票人需持本人身份证原件及演出票佩戴口罩，保持一米以上间隔距离有序检票入场。
en: The event will use a real-name system for ticket reservation and venue entry, and on the day of the event, those with ticket reservations must bring their original ID documents and tickets, wear a mask, remain one meter apart, and check their tickets and enter the venue in an orderly fashion.

zh: 婚宴期间需全程佩戴口罩，尽量避免直接交谈。
en: During the performance, masks must be worn at all times and direct conversation must be avoided as much as possible.

zh: 推销员之死是著名编剧阿瑟米勒的代表作，自1949年创作完成之后，在世界范围内都有着广泛的声望。
en: “Death of a Salesman” is a classic work by well-known screenwriter Arthur Miller that has gained wide renown around the world since its creation in 1949.

zh: 上世纪80年代在英若诚等人的斡旋下，阿瑟米勒来到中国为北京人艺培养了自己这部作品。
en: In the 1980’s, with the help of mediation by Ying Ruocheng and others, Arthur Miller visited China to participate in rehearsals of his work by Beijing People's Art Theatre.

zh: 这次剧本朗读完全由北京人艺青年演员班底构成，在导演唐烨的带领下进行了两周的排练，每个人都创作了人物小传，一边深入剖析人物，一起能够在近40年后经过重新审视，让这部现实主义戏剧讲座重新焕发魅力的光芒。
en: The current script reading is composed of young performers from Beijing People's Art Theatre, and will be held for two weeks under director Tang Ye; each performer created a biography of his or her own character to more deeply understand their own characterization, and now, 40 years after the first performances, this reexamination of the realist drama serves as a means for the play to regain its former glory.

zh: 今天2020湖南红色旅游文化节暨向他收集红色文化产业博览会开幕式，在韶山举行。
en: Today, the opening ceremony of the 2020 Hunan Red Tourism and Culture Festival and the first Xiangtan Red Culture Industry Expo was held in Shaoshan.

zh: 省委常委，省委宣传部部长赵洪森宣布红色旅游文化节开幕，富生章吴桂英讲话。
en: Zhang Hongsen, a member of the Standing Committee of the Provincial Party Committee and director of the Publicity Department of the Provincial Party Committee, announced the opening of the Red Tourism and Culture Festival, and Vice Governor Wu Guiying delivered a speech.

zh: 湖南红色旅游文化节已成功举办，16届是全国红色旅游的知名品牌。
en: The Hunan Red Tourism and Culture Festival has been successfully held for 16 years, making it a famous red tourism brand in China.

zh: 本届节会由省委宣传部省文化和旅游向他示威，市政府共同主办。
en: The festival is jointly organized by the Publicity Department of the Provincial Party Committee, the Provincial Department of Culture and Tourism, and the Xiangtan Municipal Party Committee and Government.

zh: 吴桂英说本次节会的举办，对于贯彻落实习近平总书记要把红色资源利用好，把红色传统发扬好，把红色基因传承好的重要知识，进一步抓好我省红色旅游发展，促进文旅市场复苏让红色力量凝聚成建设富饶美丽幸福新湖南的广泛合力，具有重要意义。
en: Wu Guiying said that holding this festival will play an important role in carrying out the important instructions of General Secretary Xi Jinping to "make good use of red resources, carry forward the red tradition, and do a good job of passing on red genes", thereby further accelerating the development of red tourism in the province, promoting the recovery of the cultural and tourism market, and making "Red Power" a cohesive force to build a revitalized, rich, beautiful, and happy new Hunan.

zh: 对于弘扬红色文化，传承红色精神消费，推动湖南文理高质量发展，必将发挥更积极的推动作用。
en: It will play an active role in promoting red culture, passing on the red spirit, stimulating the consumption of cultural tourism, and promoting the high-quality development of cultural tourism in Hunan.

zh: 开幕式上轰动香港力战，中国红舞邀请赛，重走长征路，穿越湘赣边两项活动同时启动。
en: At the opening ceremony, the red dance invitational competitions "Red Rocking Hunan and Jiangxi - Praising China" and "Reexperiencing the Long Match, Crossing the Boundaries of Hunan and Jiangxi" were launched at the same time.

zh: 就会期间还将举办湘潭产业项目招商推介暨签约仪式，红色旅游5号讲解员论坛暨公司教育培训研讨会，红色智慧文旅体验站进行技术分享，宫苑文化，通过湖南山歌邀请赛等活动。
en: During the festival, the Xiangtan Industrial Project Investment Promotion and Signing Ceremony, Red Tourism Five Good Commentator Forum and Red Education Training Seminar, Red Smart Culture and Tourism Experience Exhibition and New Technology Sharing Event, "Hunan Water of the Same Source, Culture of the Same Root" Hunan Folk Song Invitational Competition, and other activities will be held.

zh: 开幕式期间，张鸿森，吴桂英等领导和嘉宾到湘潭首届红色文化产业博览会现场，并观看中国出了个毛泽东实景演出。
en: During the opening ceremony, Zhang Hongsen, Wu Guiying, and other leaders and guests toured the first Xiangtan Red Culture Industry Expo and watched the live performance of "China Produced a Mao Zedong".

zh: 青海湖畔花海直播间，甜蜜或助农增收中新网。
en: Qinghai Lake “Sea of Flowers Livecast Studio”: “Sweetness“ increases farmer income - chinanews.com

zh: 图为北京厚德立丰业有限公司，总裁吴娜则推荐青海蜂产品。
en: Image: Wu Na (left), CEO of Beijing Houdeli Bee Products, promoting Qinghai apiary products.

zh: 中新网青海海南七月26日电题，青海湖畔花海直播间甜蜜的获助农增收。
en: chinanews.com, South Qinghai Lake, reported July 26th, headline: Qinghai Lake “Sea of Flowers Livecast Studio”: “Sweetness“ increases farmer income

zh: 剩下青海湖畔，满眼金花，万蜂飞舞。这是海拔较高，昼夜温差大，空气污染少，强烈的光照孕育了最顽强慷慨的蜂群，造就了青海蜂王浆高活性高蛋白，富含营养价值，低糖低脂的特点。
en: “At Qinghai Lake in midsummer, there are golden flowers as far as the eye can see, and innumerable bees flying everywhere; the high elevation is high, large temperature difference between night and day, low air pollution, and strong illumination breeds the most resilient and fertile bee colonies which create the highly active, protein-rich, and nutritious Qinghai royal jelly, which is also low in sugar and fat, “

zh: 26日青海省海南藏族自治州工业和信息管理局副局长张建勋表示。
en: said Zhang Jianxun, assistant director of the Industry and Information Administration of Hainan Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture in Qinghai Province.

zh: 当日通信站一春江住侬蜂产品直播的活动在青海湖畔举行，中国蜂产品协会及企业家代表冯龙等多方齐聚，共同推进青海特色农产品线上线下，共计销售近1万平，青海高原蜂王浆带货总额近380万元。
en: The same day, the “Fighting the Epidemic Together Spring Royal Jelly Farmer Assistance” livecast sales event was held at Qinghai Lake, at which company representatives from the Chinese Bee Products Association, beekeepers, and many others came together to promote Qinghai’s bee products, selling nearly 10,000 bottles of Qinghai Plateau royal jelly for a value of almost 3.8 million yuan.

zh: 因为冯东现场展示风采。
en: Image: Beekeepers at the event displaying their products.

zh: 据悉，此次直播对话活动借助背景，厚德立丰业连锁店，网络快手淘宝等国内知名蜂产品零售企业直播电商平台，促成企业方能种植户的交流合作，并通过线上线下渠道，持续向消费者发放青海高原春江消费券，预计企业全年让利总额近528万元。
en: According to reports, this livecast sales event helped the Beijing Houdeli Bee Products, Kuaishou, Taobao, and other well-known chain store networks, live broadcast platforms, and e-commerce platforms promote “enterprise + apiary + grower” exchange and cooperation, connect online and offline channels, and continue to issue “Qinghai Plateau Spring Jelly Consumption Vouchers” to consumers, helping these customers earn an estimated total annual profit of nearly 5.28 million yuan.

zh: 对此北京厚德立丰业股份有限公司总裁吴娜认为很值得，此举能够扩大青海蜂产品的知名度，吸引更多消费者了解，喜欢，无添加纯天然的蜂产品，带动蜂农增收。
en: Wu Na, CEO of Beijing Houdeli Bee Products, said the event was “very worthwhile”: “This event helps grow the popularity of Qinghai bee products, helps more consumers to learn about and appreciate pure, natural bee products without additives, and drives beekeeper income growth.” “

zh: 目前该公司已与青海与蜜蜂业有限公司，青海花宝蜂业股份合作公司，签订生产合作战略协议，共同推动青海当地蜂产业长足发展。
en: Currently, the company has signed strategic production cooperation agreements with Qinghai Cloud Honey LTD and Qinghai Huabao Bee Industry Holdings LTD, and they will work together to promote the rapid development of Qinghai’s bee products industry.

zh: 图为青海湖畔油菜花海。
en: Image: Rape blossoms beside Qinghai Lake.

zh: 今春各地疫情防控需要设置道路通行关卡的路途受阻，许多蜜蜂因错过花期缺少食物而死亡，风能收入受到严重影响。
en: This spring, due to roadblocks set up to control the epidemic, beekeepers have been blocked from their usual “following the flowers to produce honey” routes, many bees have died of starvation because they missed the flowering periods, and beekeeper incomes have suffered a sharp decline.

zh: 一年到头蜂农们跟随花期长途跋涉，从云南四川一路向北，前往西北地区，他们风餐露宿，居无定所，十分辛苦。
en: Throughout the year, beekeepers typically travel long distances to follow the flowering periods, from Yunnan and Sichuan all the way to the northwest, they are exposed to the weather and have no fixed residence, and it’s very difficult work.

zh: 作为企业，我们有责任帮助他们。
en: We have a responsibility as entrepreneurs to help them, “

zh: 吴娜称。
en: said Wu Na.

zh: 小蜜蜂是环境侦查并污染严重的地区，蜜蜂也无法生存。中国蜂产品协会常务副会长赵小川介绍，蜜蜂授粉是生态链的重要环节，对于保护植物的多样性和改善生态环境有着不可替代的作用。
en: “Bees are ‘nature’s advance scouts’, because they can’t survive in heavily polluted areas. “ Zhao Xiaochuan, deputy secretary of the China Bee Products Association, explained that pollination by bees is a very important link in the ecological chain, and that it plays an irreplaceable role in protecting plant diversity and improving the environment.

zh: 同时蜜蜂授粉能使农作物增产提质，特别在观众而管理条件差的地区受封的意义更大。
en: Bee pollination also increases the yield and quality of crops, and is even more important in regions with a wide diversity of crops and poor farm management.

zh: 研究数据显示，能够使油菜增产15%~30%左右。
en: Research data proves that pollination improves rapeseed yields by 15-30%.

zh: 图为中国蜂产品协会常务副会长赵小川推荐青海蜂产品。
en: Image: Zhao Xiaochuan (right), deputy secretary of the China Bee Products Association, introducing Qinghai bee products.

zh: 蜜蜂授粉创造的经济生态和社会效益远大于产品本身的价值，产业在人类健康农作物生产植被生态保护方面潜力巨大，而人们一直对此知之甚少。
en: “The economic, environmental, and social benefits of bee pollination go far beyond the mere value of the bee products, and the apiary industry has enormous potential in the areas of human health, plant reproduction, and environmental protection, but there has never been wide awareness of this fact, “

zh: 赵小川表示。
en: said Zhao Xiaochuan.

zh: 而如今养蜂人数越来越少，除了常年奔波在外的蜂农，尚有许多行动不便的贫困户，选择以风险入股合作社。
en: The number of beekeepers is declining, but in addition to the traveling industry professionals, there are also many poor households with limited mobility who practice beekeepers as part of cooperatives.

zh: 国家有资金支持我们联系技术人员帮助指导，房东对市场环境缺乏了解与判断，要打开销路，也许政府企业产业协会的帮助与协调。
en: “The country offers financial support, and we’ve contacted technology experts for help and guidance, but beekeepers lack understanding and discernment of the market environment, so opening new markets requires help and coordination from government, enterprises, and industry associations, “

zh: 赵小川说。
en: said Zhao Xiaochuan.

zh: 希望大家在未来更多关注保护养蜂群体，表示我们的蜂产品严格按照国家标准进行筛选和管控，保证品质，在帮助房东的同时保护消费者权益。
en: “I hope people will pay more attention to beekeepers and offer them support in the future,” said Wu Na. “And as we strive to help beekeepers, we strictly adhere to national standards in the selection and control of our bee products to ensure quality and protect the rights of consumers.” “

zh: 受持续降雨影响，自7月22日以来，重庆武隆区土地乡六井村滑坡后缘土体开裂，出现大面积化翼变形，完全阻断延长和行程8000守卫13米，测库容水量约55万立方米的堰塞体。
en: Affected by continuous rainfall, since July 22, the soil at the rear edge of the Zhongbao landslide in the Zhongtai group, Liujing village, Tudi township, Wulong district, Chongqing has cracked, causing a large area of ​​slippage and deformation, completely blocking the Yancang River and forming a weir body with a water level of 13 meters in front of the dam and an estimated reservoir capacity of about 550,000 cubic meters.

zh: 为确保通航安全，重庆海事部门决定对长江杰士派至观音滩水域实施临时交通管制。
en: In order to ensure navigation safety, the Chongqing Maritime Safety Administration has decided to implement temporary traffic control in the waters from Shipan (the boundary of the Yangtze River) to Guanyintan.

zh: 据重庆气象和水文部门监测的25日起，重庆中西部及东北部地区普遍中雨到大雨，部分地区暴雨，局地大暴雨。
en: According to the Chongqing monitoring of meteorological and hydrological departments, since the 25th, there has been moderate to heavy rain in the central and western and northeast areas of Chongqing, rainstorms in some areas, and heavy rainstorm in some localized areas.

zh: 背景小河坝站将于26日晚出现最高水位，最高水位接近警戒水位。
en: The highest water level of Xiaoheba station in Fujiang River will appear on the evening of the 26th, which is close to the warning level.

zh: 为确保通航安全，重庆海事部门决定对蒋介石判日观音滩水域实施临时交通管制。
en: In order to ensure navigation safety, the Chongqing Maritime Safety Administration decided to implement temporary traffic controls in the waters from Shipan (the boundary of the Yangtze River) to Guanyintan. .

zh: 经重庆市防范与气象，水利，水文等部门和单位紧急会商研判，重庆市防汛抗旱指挥部决定发布江河洪水三级预警信息，启动防汛4级应急响应。
en: Chongqing flood control and drought relief headquarters decided to issue Level III warning information for river flooding and begin a Level IV emergency response after emergency consultation between the meteorological, water conservancy, hydrological and other departments and organizations.

zh: 重庆市防汛抗旱指挥部要求重庆江北沙坪坝童男，武隆等区县及重庆市方，指有关成员单位要高度关注与申请，尤其是长江嘉陵江，乌江涨水变化，提前分析研判发布预警，加强巡查值守，坚决果断疏散转移受威胁区域人民群众即使调集应急救援队伍和物资，快速高效处置在现场，避免群死群伤事件发生。
en: The Chongqing flood control and drought relief headquarters instructed that Jiangbei, Shapingba, Tongnan, Wulong and other districts and counties in Chongqing and relevant offices of the Chongqing flood control and drought relief headquarters should pay close attention to the rain and water situation, especially flood changes on the Yangtze River, Jialing River, and Wujiang River, analyze and judge the situation in advance, issue early warnings, strengthen patrols and safeguards, resolutely and decisively evacuate and transfer people in threatened areas, and mobilize emergency rescue teams and goods in a timely manner, quickly and efficiently deal with disasters (dangers), and avoid mass deaths and injuries.

zh: 越南驻老挝大使馆公使，限产在正式性，在老挝越南佛教协会，那我越南人总会望向省政府代表老挝老兵协会等代表一同参加了祭奠仪式。
en: The Minister-Counselor of the Vietnamese Embassy in Laos, Zheng Shixin, attended the memorial ceremony alongside representatives of the Laos Vietnamese Buddhism Association, the Lao Vietnamese Association, the Vientianne provincial government, and the Laos Veterans Association.

zh: 英烈祭奠仪式在庄严肃穆的气氛中举行，各位代表陆续响应联盟上面绘影联盟的丰功伟绩，给予了特殊团结关系。
en: The memorial ceremony for the fallen veterans had a solemn, somber atmosphere as the representatives made offerings of incense to the deceased in turn, praised the courageous achievements of the war heroes, and praised the special relationship between Vietnam and Laos.

zh: 供世界财政实行，在讲话中表示这是在捞越南人和老挝人民共同缅怀两国革命英烈以及对未亮过独立自由牺牲的英烈表达感恩之心的机会。同时也是两国人民回顾两国并肩协作，打击共同敌人，争取民族独立国家统一共同建设国家发展巩固两国关系的良好机会。
en: In her speech, Minister-Counselor Zheng Shixin said that this was an opportunity for the Lao Vietnamese and Lao people to remember the sacrifices of both countries’ revolutionary heroes, and to express their gratitude for those who laid down their lives for the two countries’ independence, but it was also a chance for the people of both countries to recall how they fought side by side against a common enemy, struggled for the independence of their peoples and to unify their countries, and worked together to build and develop their countries, making it the perfect occasion to solidify relations between the two nations.

zh: 70年前的1946年1月23日，老岳战痘联盟的28名战士在进攻英文具店时英勇牺牲。
en: On January 23rd, 1946, exactly 74 years ago, 28 soldiers of the allied Lao-Vietnamese forces heroically laid down their lives in the attack on the Phonehe stronghold.

zh: 此次进攻取得胜利，成为两国在争取民族解放革命斗争初级阶段的，具有历史性意义的胜利。
en: This successful offensive became a historically significant victory in the revolutionary struggle for national liberation of both nations.

zh: 郑世新女士强调，两国人民永远铭记为两国民族解放斗争事业牺牲的各位盈利，同时强调两国年轻一代将继续发扬老前辈英勇坚强的传统，为娱乐关系持续的繁荣发展作出应有的贡献。
en: Zheng Shixin said that the people of both nation will always remember the sacrifices of every hero in the two countries’ wars of national liberation, that the youth of both nations will carry on the heroic tradition of their ancestors, and that the relationship between the two countries would continue to grow and bear fruit, which in turn would contribute to the further prosperity and development of Vietnam and Laos.

zh: 里程碑式跨越。
en: A Milestone Leap!

zh: 国际米兰结束第3场，意甲比赛中新网。
en: Inter Milan Has Its 3000th Serie A Game - China News

zh: 中新网客户端7月26日电，北京时间26日凌晨，意甲传统豪门国际米兰迎来了里程碑之战。
en: July 26 (China News) Inter Milan, a traditional big Serie A club, commenced its milestone match in the early hours of July 26th Beijing time.

zh: 据意大利媒体统计，客场对阵热那亚意义是国际米兰队是第3件场，意甲联赛蓝黑军团也是首个解锁这项里程碑的球队。
en: According to the Italian media, the away game against Genoa is Inter Milan's 3,000th Serie A match, making it the first team to reach this milestone.

zh: 自1929年联赛改制以来，国际米兰是唯一一支从未缺席一家的队伍，也是唯一一支从未降级的球队。
en: Inter Milan is the only team to have never missed a Serie A Game since the league was reorganized in 1929, and also the only team to have never been relegated.

zh: 据意大利媒体报道，国际米兰与热那亚的比赛是蓝黑军团队史第3000场比赛。
en: According to the Italian media, Inter Milan's match against Genoa is the 3,000th match in the history of this Blue-Black-Stripes legion.

zh: 在这场里程碑之战中，国际米兰客场三球完胜热那亚。
en: During the match, Inter Milan beat Genoa by three goals away from home.

zh: 此役卢卡库梅开二度，替补出场的桑切斯也贡献一球。
en: Romelu Lukaku scored twice and Alexis Sanchez as a sub also contributed a goal.

zh: 比赛从一开始就进入了国际米兰的节奏，终于在第34分钟转化为进球。
en: The game was controlled by Inter Milan from the start, who finally scored a goal with a strong offense after 34 minutes.

zh: 意大利左路传中，卢卡库中路包抄头球破门。
en: Cristiano Biraghi sent in a cross from the left and Lukaku scored a header goal after outflanking.

zh: 第82分钟，国际米兰如法炮制，摩西右路突破后传中，桑切斯中路包抄推射得手，终场前卢卡库完成梅开二度，三集中部落作为其送出长距离直塞，卢卡库突入禁区，罗梅罗后推射空门得分，将比分定格在3:0。
en: In the 82nd minute, as if following a formula, Inter Milan’s Moses broke through on the right and crossed for Sanchez to score from the middle; before the end, Lukaku scored twice and Marcelo Brozović delivered a driven pass in the counter-offense, but Lukaku broke into the penalty area and scored with a free shot after dribbling past Romero, and the score was set at 3:0.

zh: 国际米兰客场3:0完胜热那亚，积分反超亚特兰大上升至第二，在多赛一场的情况下落后领头羊尤文图斯4分，仍保留着争冠希望。
en: Inter Milan moved back above Atalanta into 2nd place with a 3-0 win away against Genoa, and remain in the title race with four points behind Juventus with a game to spare.

zh: 这次在这跨越近就是最光阴的3000场，意甲联赛中，国际米兰赢得了其中的1489场打平834场输掉677章，胜率为49.6%。
en: Inter Milan has now won 1,489, drawn 834, and lost 677 of its 3,000 Serie A matches spanning almost 90 years, and its winning percentage is 49.6%.

zh: 期间球队共打进5038球丢3102球，场均打进1.68球。
en: Among these matches, the team has scored 5,038 goals and conceded 3,102, averaging 1.68 goals per game.

zh: 蓝黑军团18次获得联赛冠军，并且从未降级。
en: This Blue-Black-Stripes legion has won the league title 18 times and have never been relegated.

zh: 声明说，这架无人机是以军在以色列与黎巴嫩边境的蓝线附近执行任务时，坠落在利境内的。
en: According to the statement, the Israeli military drone crashed inside Lebanon near the “Blue Line” near the Lebanon-Israel border while on a mission.

zh: 声明没有提及无人机坠落的原因。
en: No explanation of the reason the drone crashed was provided in the statement.

zh: 有以色列媒体报道说，这架无人机可能是出现故障而坠落的。
en: According to Israeli media reports, the drone may have crashed due to a malfunction.

zh: 据报道，以色列副总理兼国防部长盖茨当天下午在视察以色列北部地区时，表示为了确保其安全利益，以色列将继续对叙利亚和黎巴嫩采取行动。
en: Reports state that the afternoon of the crash, while on an inspection tour in northern Israel, Israeli Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Defense Gantz said that to protect its security and interests, Israel would continue to take action against Syria and Lebanon.

zh: 以色列称其是黎巴嫩真主党，为重大安全威胁并指责伊朗方面经由叙利亚陆地走廊，向黎巴嫩真主党输送武器，伊利边境附近局势是由军长。
en: Israel has long considered Lebanese political party Hezbollah to be a major security threat, and has accused Iran of sending weapons to Hezbollah through the Syria land corridor, leading to tensions in the Lebanon-Israel border region.

zh: 以色列曾多次以打击该组织为由对叙境内目标实施空袭。
en: On the grounds of attacking Hezbollah, Israel has conducted several air raids on targets in Syria.

zh: 谍战剧老面孔柳云龙演一个结巴男主角新华网。
en: A Familiar Face in Spy TV Series, Liu Yunlong, Plays a Stuttering Hero - Xinhua Net

zh: 由柳云龙监制，尹飞执导。
en: Supervised by Liu Yunlong and directed by Yin Fei, the major spy TV series The Possibility of Victory, starring such actors and actress as Liu Yunlong, Su Qing, Liang Guanhua, and Li Liqun, will be broadcast on the 7:30 p.m. “Live Theatre” of Guangdong TV on July 16 2020.

zh: 该剧讲述了潜伏在日伪警察局的中共地下党员唐飞，刘云龙是联合苏联特工。
en: It tells the story of Tang Fei (played by Liu Yunlong), a member of Communist Party of China working undercover in a police station under the Japanese puppet government, who assassinates the head of Japanese intelligence and destroys a shocking conspiracy of the Japanese army alongside secret agents from the Soviet Union.

zh: 胜算根据事实改变。
en: The Possibility of Victory is adapted from historical facts, and is based on Soviet Union military archive materials which have been classified for many years.

zh: 莫斯科保卫战期间。
en: During the Fight for Moscow, the elite Far Eastern army of the Soviet Red Army went west to assist in the fight, but at that time the “Going North Faction” of Japan’s Kwantung Army held the view that there would be opportunities in the north, so troops should be sent.

zh: 慰藉腹背受敌之位。
en: To defeat their enemies in the front and the rear, information staff of Communist Party of China and Soviet Union jointly launched “Mudanura” plan.

zh: 根据此历史背景。
en: Given this context, noted script writer Deng Yuan revised the script several times, making the plot both thrilling and suspenseful.

zh: 刘云龙此次在上诉状中同时担任监制和男主角。
en: Liu Yunlong was both supervising producer and protagonist of the TV series.

zh: 剧中。
en: In the TV series, he plays Tang Fei, Chief of the Criminal Office of the Linhe Police Bureau, a stuttering, comical, and trouble-prone policeman, but his real identity is an underground member of Communist Party of China.

zh: 预期上演对手戏的女主角蔡某是联合保安局科长。
en: The heroine Cai Meng is Chief of Linhe Security Bureau, who is deeply beloved by her Japanese leader Fukuwara, and there is a subtle relationship between her and Tang Fei, making them “frenemies” with a romantic undertone.

zh: 苏青近年来尝试了很多不同类型的角色。
en: Su Qing has attempted to play different roles in recent years, from Lu Ruowen in We Were Young in Those Years to Erqing in Story of Yanxi Palace, all of which left a deep impression upon the general public, and her skill is now widely recognized.

zh: 此次苏青与刘云龙是首次搭档。
en: This is the first collaboration between Su Qing and Liu Yunlong, a stuttering policeman an an enchanting policewoman, and is both eye-catching and novel.

zh: 除了两位主角外。
en: Apart from the two protagonists, many skilled actors, including Liang Guanhua, Li Liqun, Qian Bo, Lei Han, Shen Junyi, also perform in the TV series, which makes it even more attractive.

zh: 据了解。
en: According to sources, the production is very detailed, and the crew selected venues in three provinces, including Jiangsu, Zhejiang and Liaoning provinces, travelling nearly 2,000 kilometers.

zh: 为了还原东北日据时期光怪陆离的城市风貌。
en: To restore the gorgeous urban appearance of Northeast China as captured by Japanese invaders, the art and prop team worked around the clock, carefully designing every detail of the settings and props, which enables the richly detailed scenes and captures the historical essence of the era.

zh: 也门西部两省洪灾导致16人死亡中新网。
en: Sixteen dead in floods in two western Yemen provinces - chinanews.com

zh: 新华社科威特城7月26日电记者王维萨那消息据也门当地媒体26日报道爷们西部和泰大厦和哈杰省遭遇强降雨过去，48小时内洪灾已造成至少16人死亡。
en: Xinhua News Agency, Kuwait City Bureau, July 26th (Correspomdents: Nie Yunpeng, Wang Wei) reported from Sana’a: Local media reports on the 26th stated that, after downpours and flooding in the Hodeidah and Hajj governates in western Yemen, at least 16 are dead in the past 48 hours.

zh: 报道说太大声降雨引发的洪水造成13人死亡，临近的省有三人在火灾中丧生。
en: According to such reports, the floods caused by heavy rainfall have killed 13 in Hodeidah governate and 3 in neighboring Hajjah governate.

zh: 此为荷台达省北部以及哈杰省南部地区共有数十座房屋被洪水摧毁，部分道路和农田也遭到不同程度损毁。
en: In addition, dozens of houses have been destroyed in northern Hodeidah and southern Hajjah, with some roads and cropland also suffering varying degrees of damage.

zh: 持续数年的军事冲突，造成emi的卫生系统几近崩溃。
en: Years of ongoing military conflict in Yemen have pushed the country’s to near collapse.

zh: 据联合国人道主义事务协调厅统计数据显示2017年以来，人们感染霍乱的人数已超过100万人，死亡人数超过2000人。
en: Since 2017, cholera has infected over 1 million and caused over 2,000 deaths, according to statistics from the United Nations Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs.

zh: 也门医疗机构担心持续的洪灾会导致霍乱疫情再度蔓延。
en: Medical organizations in Yemen have expressed concern that continued flooding will lead to further cholera outbreaks.

zh: 绝地出击上映。陆战全台筑梦人生新华网。
en: “The Jedi Attack” Released to Show Fighting in the Ring and Pursuit of Dreams - XinhuaNet

zh: 由青年导演告状，知道连威廉，杨欣然，王一博等主演的网络电影，绝地出击，正式在爱奇艺上映。
en: Directed by young director Gao Zhuangzhuang and starring William Liao, Dongyu, Yang Xinran and Wang Yibo, the online movie "The Jedi Attack" is showing on IQIYI now.

zh: 影片讲述了落魄拳手Venus重返拳台并为尊严而战的故事，展示了一段热血沸腾的放肆筑梦之旅。
en: The film tells the story of a disgraced boxer, Venus, who returns to the ring and fights for dignity, as well as a passionate and audacious journey to pursue the dream.

zh: 电影绝地出击，以泰国为主要情节推动的，将泰拳作为落魄拳王VS追梦的起点，整个故事都是在传统中国文化价值观的改变下进行，无论是维纳斯前期为了师傅而下定，大家劝的决心还是后期，在朋友和爱人的支持下重新振作，为尊严而战的努力，都展示了中国传统文化中男性对家庭和梦想的追求与大爱。
en: The movie "The Jedi Attack" primarily takes place in Thailand, and uses "Muay Thai" as the starting point for Venus, a disgraced boxer, to pursue his dream; the story is an adaptation of traditional Chinese cultural values, and both Venus's determination to fight fake boxing for his master in the early stage and his efforts to fight for dignity with the support of his friends and lover in the later stage show the pursuit and love for family and dreams in traditional Chinese culture.

zh: 结合经典的好莱坞运动电影故事模式和中泰两国专业团队的强强联手，绝地出击不仅呈现了国际化的效果，也将打动不同类型观众。
en: By combining a classic Hollywood sports movie story with the strong cooperation of the professional teams of China and Thailand, “The Jedi Attack” not only presents an international face, but will appeal to a wide range of audiences.

zh: 同时接地触及大量的展示，泰拳搏击和训练的剧情，场面的激烈和热血。
en: Meanwhile, “The Jedi Attack” shows several fighting and training elements in Muay Thai, and the fight scenes are fierce and passionate.

zh: 片中有冻雨饰演的游戏设计师张晓亮，通过格斗游戏帮助油料伪劣食盐的Venus，重新回到拳台，并摘下桂冠的情节，将刑期区委的高科技与热血高燃的竞技比赛结合在一起，也展示了张小亮和维也纳开始到不同时则目标一致的兄弟情谊。
en: In the movie, Zhang Xiaoliang, the game designer played by Dongyu, helps Venus, played by William Liao, return to the ring and win the championship through fighting games, and it combines novel and interesting high-tech elements with hot-blooded competition, and also shows the brotherhood between Zhang Xiaoliang and Venus, which appears to be different, but is actually based on a common goal.

zh: 此为维纳斯与剪纸，在细水长流的爱情也十分感人，渐渐对维纳斯一直以来的默默支持和维纳斯的坚定的坚定承诺，都让观众看到了Venus身上的铁汉柔情，也为这位落魄拳王身上增添了许多人情味。
en: In addition, the long-running love between Venus and Jingjing is also very touching, with Jingjing's constant silent support for Venus and Venus's firm commitment to Jingjing showing the audience Venus’s tender side, which also adds a lot of human kindness to the disgraced boxer.

zh: 4部门联合行动。
en: United action by four departments!

zh: 启动英文违法违规，收集使用个人信息治理工作，中新网。
en: Corrective work on illegal and violating collection and use of personal information by apps - chinanews.com

zh: 启动英文违法违规，收集使用个人信息治理工作。
en: Corrective work on illegal and violating collection and use of personal information by apps.

zh: 全国信息安全标准化技术委员会，中国消费者协会，中国互联网协会，中国网络空间安全协会，以及相关专业评估机构参加了会议。
en: The conference was attended by the National Information Security Standardization Technical Committee, China Consumers Association, Internet Society of China, Cybersecurity Association of China, and other related professional evaluation institutions.

zh: 英文违法违规收集使用个人信息治理工作组利用微信公众号英文，个人信息举报网站，英文英文260，英文英文两种专门渠道，受理广大网民关于违法违规收集使用个人信息的线索举报和问题反映。
en: The corrective work on illegal and violating collection and use of personal information by apps will be conducted through two dedicated channels, the WeChat Public Account (“App Personal Information Reporting”) and website (pip.tc260.org.cn), where netizens can report evidence and offer feedback on the illegal and violating collection and use of personal information.

zh: 同时广大网民也可向违法和不良信息举报中心，12377网络不良与垃圾信息举报受理中心，英文12321英文等平台举报和反映不法行为。
en: At the same time, netizens can also report and offer feedback on illegal behaviors to platforms such as the Illegal and Improper Information Reporting Center (www.12377.cn) and the Center for Reporting and Handling Spam (www.12321.cn).

zh: 绿地开启新一轮上海国资拟转让17.5%股份经济观察网专业财经新闻网站。
en: Greenland Launches a New Round of Mixed Reform, and Shanghai State-owned Assets Transfers 17.5% of Its Shares - www.eeo.com.cn - Professional Financial News Website

zh: 经济观察网记者，7月26日绿地控股600606英文发布，关于国有股东拟通过公开征集受让方的方式，协议转让公司部分股份暨复牌的提示性公告。
en: Eeo.com.cn reporter Rao Xianjun, July 26, Greenland Holdings (600606.SH) issued a "Suggestive Announcement on the State-owned Shareholders' Intention to Transfer Part of the Company's Shares and Resume Trading through Public Solicitation of the Transferee."

zh: 公告内容显示，为进一步深化国资国企改革，优化国资布局结构，调整完善绿地股权结构，上海地产集团有限公司以下简称上海地产，上海城投集团有限公司以下简称上海城投拟通过公开征集受让方的方式，协议转让所持有的公司部分股份，你转让的股份比例合计不超过绿地总股本的17.5%。
en: According to the announcement, in order to further deepen the reform of state-owned assets and state-owned enterprises, optimize the structural adjustment of state-owned assets, and improve the ownership structure of Greenland, Shanghai Land (Group) Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Shanghai Land") and Shanghai Chengtou Investment (Group) Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Shanghai Chengtou Investment") plan to transfer part of the shares of the company held by the transferee through public solicitation, and the total proportion of the shares to be transferred shall not exceed 17.5% of the total share capital of Greenland.

zh: 本次拟转让股份的价格不低于下列两者之中的较高者，提示性公告日，2020年7月27日前30个交易日的每日加权平均价格的算术平均值，最近一个会计年度公司经审计的每股净资产值。
en: The price of the shares to be transferred this time shall not be lower than the higher of the following two: the arithmetic average of the daily weighted average price of the 30 trading days before the suggestive announcement date (July 27, 2020); the audited net asset value per share of the company in the latest accounting year.

zh: 目前对绿地的新战略投资者仍无定论，按照公告公示信息估算新战略投资者又拿下绿地，此次混改中转让的17.5%股权需要支付约140亿元的资金。
en: At present, there is still no final conclusion on the new strategic investors of Greenland, but according to the information estimates in the announcement, the new strategic investors need to pay about RMB 14 billion to take the 17.5% equity transferred in the mixed-use reform of Greenland.

zh: 值得注意的是，本次股份转让完成后，预计绿地仍无控股股东及实际控制人，但控制权结构可能发生较大变化。
en: It is worth noting that after the completion of the share transfer, Greenland is expected to have no controlling shareholders and actual controllers, but the control structure may change greatly.

zh: 绿地控股自创立以来进行了多次体制机制改革，1992年到1997年，在纯国有体制下按照市场化规则运行，1997年到2013年建立并不断完善国有控股，职工持股的股份制，2014年到2015年引进战略投资者，形成国有及非公有资本交叉持股，相互融合的混合所有制，二零15年至今整体上市成为公众公司。
en: Since its establishment, Greenland Holdings has carried out many institutional reforms: from 1992 to 1997, it was operated under the pure state-owned system in accordance with market-oriented rules; from 1997 to 2013, it established and continuously improved the joint-stock system of state-owned holding and employee shareholding; from 2013 to 2015, strategic investors were introduced to form a mixed ownership system of cross-shareholding and mutual integration of state-owned and non-public capital; and since 2015, the company has been entirely listed and has become a public company.

zh: 绿地目前的混改方案与格力香4 2019年12月，高瓴资本领衔珠海明军以416.62医院接受格力电器，00065亿应为15%股权，格力集团推举小股东完成混改后，格力电器实施了高管激励计划，失控人结构等现代化的企业管理方式。
en: Greenland's current mixed reform plan is similar to Gree's: in December 2019, Zhuhai Mingjun, led by Hillhouse Capital, took over 15% of the shares of Gree Electric Appliances (000651.SZ) with RMB 41.662 billion, and the Gree Group retreated to being the minority shareholder; after the completion of the mixed reform, Gree implemented modern enterprise management methods, such as executive incentive plans and no real controller structure.

zh: 上海地产上海城投均为上海市国资委全资持有的国资企业集团，绿地控股董事长总裁张玉良表示绿地刺激是上海按照党中央要求，推进国资国企综合性改革，加速现阶段国资国企改革的重要举措，充分显示了因地制宜，量体裁衣的改革新思路，通过跟上市公司引入新的优秀战略股东，支持企业进一步提高市场化程度，提升经营管理自由度，加速改革活力，全面释放。
en: Shanghai Land and Shanghai Chengtou Investment are all state-owned enterprise groups wholly owned by Shanghai SASAC, and Zhang Yuliang, chairman and president of Greenland holdings, said that Greenland's move is an important measure for Shanghai to promote the comprehensive reform of state-owned assets and enterprises and accelerate the reform of state-owned assets and enterprises in the new era in accordance with the requirements of the CPC Central Committee; it also fully shows the new concept of reform that adapts measures to local conditions and acts according to actual circumstances, because it is necessary to introduce new shareholders to support the reform of corporate strategy, further improve the degree of corporate management freedom, and accelerate the full release of reform vitality.

zh: 跨省游恢复，全国首趟跨省动车旅游专列开行，新华网。
en: Inter-province travel resumes, nation’s first high-speed train tour launches - Xinhuanet

zh: 新华社杭州7月25日电，记者李萍，7月25日12:20乘坐g71次动车的200余名上海游客，顺利抵达浙江省兰溪市，这也是7月14日文化和旅游部恢复跨省区市，团队又一全国首套，跨上动车旅游专列。
en: Xinhua News Agency, Hangzhou, reported July 25th (Correspondent: Li Ping) On July 25th, over 200 tourists from Shanghai on the D771 train arrived in Lanxi, Zhejiang Province, making this the first group tour to take an inter-provincial train since the Ministry of Culture and Tourism resumed inter-province (region, city) group tours on July 14th.

zh: 地处浙江中西部的兰溪市风光秀丽，境内拥有整个八卦村，地下长河置业顾问等众多名胜景点，在两点一夜的行程中，200余名上海游客将一一领略这些景点。
en: Located in central and western Jiangxi, Lanxi City boasts beautiful scenery and many scenic spots such as Zhuge Bagua Village, the Dixia Changhe Scenic Area, and Zhiyan Village, all of which are to be visited by the more than 200 tourists in the tour group on their 2-day 1-night trip.

zh: 上海铁路国际旅游集团有限公司副总经理李丽说，公司根据最新政策紧盯跨省有需求，第一时间与联系是沟通，接洽进行，推出上海至兰溪和夏日赏荷二日游，产品推出不到一周时间即售罄。
en: Li Li, assistant general manager of Shanghai Railway International Tourism (Group) LTD, said that based on the latest policies, the company closely monitors demand for inter-province travel, communicates closely with Lanxi, and launched the “Shanghai to Lanxi” and “Summer Lotus-Viewing Two-Day Tour” products, the latter of which sold out less than a week after launching.

zh: 来自上海的孙阿姨说，因为疫情几年一直没有出门。
en: Mrs. Sun, from Shanghai, said she hadn’t left her house this year because of the pandemic.

zh: 在家闷久了，一看到有团队，又马上把消息分享给朋友一起报名，以前从来没有来过兰溪，非常期待这次旅行，孙阿姨说。
en: “I’ve been bored sitting at home for a long time, so when I saw a group tour, I shared the news with my friends right away, and we all signed up, and I’ve never visited Lanxi, so I’ve been looking forward to this trip, “ said Mrs. Sun.

zh: 据了解，去年9月，兰溪市与上海铁路国际旅游集团有限公司签订乘高铁游览器项目战略合作协议，计划一年内从江浙沪皖4地开行12趟高铁旅游专列到兰溪。
en: Sources state that in September of last year, Lanxi and Shanghai Railway International Tourism (Group) LTD signed the “Ride the High-Speed Rail to Lanxi” strategic cooperation agreement, which aims to operate 12 dedicated high-speed tourism trains from Jiangsu, Zhejiang, Shanghai, and Anhui to Lanxi within the year.

zh: 我锻炼我自己。
en: Smacked themselves in the face?

zh: 美国白宫顾问有个周公国皂，中新网。
en: White House Adviser “Counterattacks” States’ Premature Reopening-ChinaNews.com

zh: 美国白宫顾问file各种副功过早。
en: White House Adviser “Counterattacks” States’ Premature Reopening

zh: 当地时间7月23日，美国相关肺炎确诊病例数突破400万，占全球病例30%。
en: As of July 23 local time, the number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in the United States topped 4 million, accounting for 30% of global cases.

zh: 数月来美国，总统特朗普反复要求全国各州复工复学，直至今日才改变态度，主动在功课上或佩戴口罩，而他的顾问更是反咬一口成一些，政府复工个造。
en: For months, U.S. President Trump has repeatedly asked for states to reopen businesses and schools, and only recently changed his attitude and started wearing masks in public, while his advisers accuse some state governments of reopening businesses too early.

zh: 22日被总统顾问凯莉安在新闻发布会上表示一些州政府没有遵守复工标准，过早重启了就把之类的场所。
en: On 22nd, White House adviser Kellyanne Conway said at a press conference that some states didn’t follow reopening standards and opened businesses like bars too early.

zh: 岗位还得到，此前关于总统有绝对权力决定各种复古诗意的说法是我抓的又严。
en: Conway also mentioned that statements regarding the President having “absolute power” in deciding states reopening matters are misinformed rumors.

zh: 总统是个联邦主义者，他相信各州都有自主权。
en: “The President is a federalist who believes in the autonomous rights of states. "

zh: 他为特朗普便接道。
en: she said in Trump’s defense.

zh: 但二口中的必要，在10月13日北宫雨情通报会上亲口说出的。
en: However, this so-called “rumor” was stated by Trump himself at the White House outbreak briefing on April 13.

zh: 对此范自我大连的操作被网友们嘲讽为改写历史。
en: This flip-flop was mocked on the internet as “rewriting history”.

zh: Kelly康伟想要感谢律师，他是个骗子。
en: Attempting to rewrite history makes Kellyanne Conway a liar.

zh: 特朗普称密歇根州州长格雷琴，惠特莫是独裁者，因为它遵循了医疗准则，坚持停工。
en: Trump called Gretchen Whitmer, governor of Michigan, a dictator because she followed medical guidelines and insisted on lockdown.

zh: 特朗普将推动复工，这样他就可以举行集会。
en: Trump wanted to facilitate reopening so that he could hold rallies.

zh: 这不是第1次引起争议了。
en: This isn’t the first time Kellyanne Conway has caused controversy.

zh: 4月15日康卫在接受福克斯新闻采访时，脱口而出，这是因为19又不是英文朋友们。
en: On April 15, when interviewed by Fox News, Conway blurted out, “This is COVID-19, not COVID-1, folks! "

zh: 他似乎把19理解成了一个版本号，被网友们疯狂调侃，没常识就看看报纸。
en: She seemed to have taken “19” as a version number and was laughed at on the internet, “Read a newspaper if you have no common sense!”

zh: 三岁孩童大学操场玩耍被砸获配后，再速效方有林吗？
en: 3-Year Old Hit When Playing on University Sports Ground, Reasonable to Sue After Compensation is Paid?

zh: 操场被杀害同获赔后再速效仿。
en: Hit on Sports Ground, Child Sues University After Compensation is Paid

zh: 三岁的小文在某大学操场玩耍时，意外被篮球队的陈某在投球时砸中了头部。
en: When playing on sports ground of an university, 3-year old Xiaowen was accidentally hit in the head by a softball thrown by Chen from the softball team.

zh: 陈某赔偿后，向文的父亲文先生作为小文的法定代理人，将学校诉至法院，要求事发操场所在的学校赔礼道歉并支付医疗费精神损失，抚慰金等共计2万元。
en: After being compensated by Chen for the accident, Xiaowen’s father, acting as Xiaowen’s legal guardian, sued the university in court, demanding an apology for what happened on the sports ground and a total of 20,000 yuan for medical bills and emotional distress.

zh: 近日，北京市海淀区人民法院对此案审理后认为，事发时学校在操场设置了防护网以尽到适当的安全保障义务，且陈某已进行了赔偿，据此判决驳回了原告的诉讼请求。
en: Recently, the People’s Court of Haidian District in Beijing heard the case and believed the university fulfilled its obligation to provide appropriate safety assurance by setting up a protective barrier at the sports ground; in addition, Chen had already compensated for the accident, and therefore, the claims of the plaintiff were dismissed.

zh: 温先生诉称，2019年暑假期间，他带小文在学校操场玩耍，当时正值垒球队在操场训练。
en: As Mr. Wen claims, he took Xiaowen to the sports ground of the university during summer vacation in 2019, and the softball team was training on the sports ground at the same time.

zh: 为了规避由此带来的风险，要问问先生和其他众多小朋友及家长在内球队制定的安全区域内活动。
en: To avoid potential risks, Xiaowen and Mr. Wen and other parents and children were playing in a safety area designated by the softball team.

zh: 但之后篮球队队员陈某在投球时脱手，导致球越过护网，飞至上述安全区内，并集中销往后脑。
en: However, later when Chen, a member of the softball team, was throwing the ball, it slipped out of his hand, went over the protective barrier into the safety area, and hit Xiaowen in the back of her head.

zh: 温先生立即带小文去医院治疗，被诊断为头外伤。
en: Mr. Wen took Xiaowen to the hospital immediately, and she was diagnosed as having head trauma.

zh: 温先生认为学校球场的设施不符合相关安全规定，未对球队及相关设施进行有效管理。
en: Mr. Wen believes the sports field facilities are not in line with safety regulations and the university failed to effectively manage the softball team and relevant facilities.

zh: 学校的过失导致上述事件发生，导致小雯身心遭受巨大的痛苦，同时也给其家人带来了较大的痛苦，对此学校应当承担法律责任。
en: It was negligence of the university that led to the incident, which caused physical and mental distress for Xiaowen and her family, hence the university should take legal responsibility.

zh: 对此校方辩称，学校已经在操场设置了防护网，并张贴了管理规定，训练通知告知进入操场许愿，练场地保持安全距离，并提醒注意自身安全，原告也不能证明学校未尽到安全保障义务，所以不同意赔偿。
en: Against these accusations, the university argued that it has set up protective barrier around the sports field and posted management regulations and training notices informing people to keep a safe distance from the training field when entering the sports ground and to be aware of their personal safety, and because the plaintiff couldn’t prove the university “didn’t fulfill safety assurance obligations”, the university refused to pay compensation.

zh: 法院审理后认为事发的场地系涉案大学对公众免费开放的场地，学校对操场的管理存在安全保障义务，但这种安全保障义务仅需达到一般的注意义务即可。
en: After hearing the case, the court believed the venue where the incident took place is open to public for free, and though the university bears safety assurance obligations for the sports ground, the extent of its obligations were merely to have general notices.

zh: 是法师，学校在操场设置了防护网，已经尽到了适当的安全保障义务，且陈某也按照此前达成的赔偿协议，向小雯背上了医疗费，交通费等各项损失2,000亿元，双方约定此次纠纷一次性解决。
en: When the incident took place, there was a protective barrier set up by the university on the sports ground, meaning the appropriate safety assurance obligations were fulfilled, and Chen paid over 2,000 yuan in compensation for Xiaowen’s medical bill, transportation, and other losses according to the compensation agreement reached, so the two parities agreed to settle their dispute once and for all.

zh: 事后小文家长再次主张学校赔偿于法无据，法院判决驳回了原告的全部诉请。
en: Afterwards, Xiaowen’s parents’ claims for compensation from the university was found to be groundless, and the court ruled to dismiss all claims of the plaintiff.

zh: 宣判后双方均未上诉，该判决现已生效。
en: After neither party decided to appeal, the verdict became effective.

zh: 根据我国侵权责任法第37条规定，学校作为公共场所的管理人负有安全保障义务在第3人的行为，造成他人损害的情况下，第3人承担侵权责任，而未尽到安全保障义务的公共场所管理人应当承担相应的补充责任。
en: According to Article 37 of Tort Liability Law, as the manager of a public place, the university bears safety assurance obligations; and when actions of a third party cause damages to others, the third party takes tort liability, while manager of the public place that fails to fulfill safety assurance obligations takes complementary liabilities.

zh: 法官称由于作为公共场所的管理人，最有可能了解整个场所的实际情况，预见可能发生的危险和损害，从而最有可能采取必要措施防止损失的发生或者减轻损害的程度，且避免和减轻损害发生的成本最低。故而法律规定由其承担从事社会活动相应的保障义务。
en: The judge stated that because manager of the public place is the party most likely to know the actual state of the site, and to foresee potential dangers and harms, it is the most likely party to take necessary measures to prevent losses from happening or reduce damages and to keep the cost of damage prevention or reduction to a minimum, meaning the law requires it to bear the appropriate safety assurance obligations when engaging in social activities.

zh: 本案中对于向公众免费开放的操场中，不特定的进入人群，学校所负的安全保障义务应与其从事的社会活动相适应，具体而言主要是并采取基本的安全措施，并对于隐蔽性为县妇幼告知义务。
en: In this case, for the non-specific group of people entering the sports ground open to public for free, the school’s safety assurance obligation were in line with the social activities it was engaged in, specifically which were primarily to take basic safety measures and to inform people of hidden dangers.

zh: 司法实践中也不宜对公共场所管理人可以过高的安全保障义务。
en: In juridical practice, it’s not advised to make safety assurance obligations too high or too strict for the managers of public places.

zh: 如果学校已经采取了设置防护网，且尽到告知义务，则可以认定学校不具有过错，不应承担法律责任。
en: If the university has set up a protective barrier and fulfilled its duty to inform, the university is considered not at fault and does not bear legal responsibility.

zh: 此为对于第3人侵权，即使学校等公共场所的管理者未尽到安全保障义务，其承担的责任也是作为一种损害赔偿的补充，根据最新颁布的民法典，管理者承担补充责任后，还可以向第3人追偿。
en: Furthermore, as to third party tort, even if the manager of public places such as a university doesn’t fulfill its safety assurance obligations, its liability is complementary to damage compensation; according to the new Civil Code, the manager can claim compensation from the third party after assuming complementary liability.

zh: 故在此类事故中，受害者在已经受到直接侵权人的赔偿后，不应再扩大球场范围。
en: Therefore, the victim must not expand the scope of the claim after receiving compensation from the directly liable party in this kind of accident.

zh: 疫情防控常态化，直向人们运动健身的热情高涨。
en: With regular pandemic prevention and control, people are more enthusiastic about exercise and fitness.

zh: 随着跨省旅游业务的逐步放开，旅游市场也即将迎来复苏。
en: As the restriction of inter-provincial tourism business has gradually slackened, the tourism market is also about to welcome a recovery.

zh: 福建省从7月21日起恢复了跨省旅游业务开放后的第1个周末，作为旅游热门目的地的厦门迎来了客流高峰。
en: Fujian Province has resumed its inter-provincial tourism business from July 21, and in the first weekend after opening, Xiamen, a popular tourist destination, saw a peak in passenger flow.

zh: 作为热门的旅游目的地城市，在周末抵达厦门旅行的游客不少。
en: As a popular tourist destination city, many tourists arrived in Xiamen on the weekend.

zh: 厦门火车站预计暑运将发送旅客370万人次，机场客流则以学生旅游探亲流为主。
en: It is estimated that the Xiamen Railway Station will see 3.7 million passengers in summer, while the passenger flow at the airport is dominated by students, tourists, and people visiting relatives.

zh: 旅游市场逐步回暖，7月厦门机场日均运行440架次，国内航班已经恢复到了1000的80%。
en: The tourism market is recovering gradually, and in July, Xiamen Airport operated an average of 440 flights per day, and domestic flights have recovered to 80% of the pre-pandemic level.

zh: 航空公司加密了厦门至上海，北京，昆明，西安等主要城市的空中快线，抢占复苏后的利用市场。
en: Airlines have increased the air express lanes from Xiamen to Shanghai, Beijing, Kunming, Xi'an and other major cities to seize the revived tourism market.

zh: 目前厦门多家旅行社陆续上线一批暑期国内跨省游产品团队行程主要以室外景点为主。
en: At present, a number of travel agencies in Xiamen have successively launched a batch of domestic cross-provincial travel products during summer vacations, and the group itinerary is mainly focused on outdoor attractions.

zh: 针对火车站及常出现的暑期客运高峰相关单位，在值机柜台，安检通道等人员聚集的区域，增派了人手进行疏导，附件还对8名健康吗进行优化升级，实现了约31个省之间的健康数据共享和互通互认，推动旅游市场有序复苏。
en: In response to peak passenger flow in summer in railway stations and airports, relevant organizations have deployed additional manpower in areas where people are likely to gather such as check-in counters and security check lanes, and Fujian has also optimized and upgraded the "Fujian health QR code", realized health data sharing and mutual recognition with 31 provinces, and promoted the orderly recovery of the tourism market.

zh: 刘德华，刘青云能否拆出新火花？新华网。
en: Can Andy Lau and Sean Lau “run” up new sparks? - Xinhuanet

zh: 拆弹专家二近日宣布将于12月24日上映。
en: It was recently announced that “Running Out of Time 2” will be released on December 24th, making it the first film to set its release date during the winter holiday season.

zh: 第2部依然是求little导演。
en: This sequel, again directed by Liu Qitao and produced by Andy Lau, presents a brand-new story in the series.

zh: 据悉。
en: Sources say that the addition of a “nuclear bomb” to the plot raises the stakes the challenge faced by these demolition experts, the stunning scenes in the trailers have audiences waiting on tenterhooks, and the shot of the mushroom cloud enveloping the airport is especially shocking.

zh: 三年前。
en: Three years ago, the first “Running Out of Time” produced by the original team earned the highest box office total of the May Day holiday season, won 7 nominations at the Hong Kong Film Awards, and made “Qiu Litao x Andy Lau” a golden partnership to film lovers everywhere.

zh: 此次的拆弹专家2。
en: Now, people are hoping that these partners can produce new sparks on the silver screen with “Running Out of Time 2”.

zh: 拆弹专家二将输了全新的故事，牵扯的专家潘成峰，刘德华晕倒在爆炸案现场。
en: “Running Out of Time 2” brings us an entirely new story: former bomb disposal expert Pan Chengfeng (played by Andy Lau) passes out at a bombing crime scene, causing the police to consider him a suspect.

zh: 为了寻找真相。
en: To discover the truth, he is forced to ask his bomb disposal expert friend Dong Zhuowen (played by Sean Lau) for help.

zh: 基于破案的女督察。
en: Pang Ling, the female detective assigned to the case and Pan Chengfeng’s former girlfriend (played Ni Ni) is also pulled into the fray.

zh: 依然是拆弹专家。
en: Pan Chengfeng is still a bomb disposal expert, but in the release date announcement trailer, Andy Lau’s new role is more complex: after breaking his leg, he attaches a prosthetic leg, and then defuses a bomb while being chased by Sean Lau and taking instructions from his ex-girlfriend Ni Ni.

zh: 三人究竟是怎样的关系？
en: Just what is the relationship between the three characters, what does Andy Lau do in the Hong Kong hotel, what kind of case is he involved in, and what happened to his bomb disposal career are all questions to which audiences crave answers.

zh: 据了解。
en: Sources tell us that the film’s highlights include on-location shooting at world-famous Hong Kong landmarks, and coupled with the industry-leading special effects team, we expect the film to deliver a mind-blowing cinematic experience.

zh: 中新网7月26日电，综合俄罗斯卫星网报道，7月26日是俄罗斯海军日庆祝海军日的主要月饼是在圣彼得堡和卡拉斯塔德举行。
en: July 26, (Ecns.cn) According to Sputnik News, July 26 is Russia’s Navy Day, and the main military parade to celebrate the Navy Day was held in St. Petersburg and Kronshtadt.

zh: 俄罗斯总统，俄联邦武装力量最高统帅普京抵达客户活动，第15艘舰艇和潜艇接受了检阅。
en: The President and Supreme Commander of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation Putin arrived in Kronshtadt to participate in the celebration, where he inspected 15 ships and submarines.

zh: 当地时间2019年7月28日，俄罗斯圣彼得堡举行盛大阅兵式庆祝海军节。
en: On July 28, 2019 (MSK), Russia held a grand military parade to celebrate Navy day in St. Petersburg.

zh: 据报道，普京向海军官兵祝贺海军日并称，小婷在芬兰晚上从将要参加海上阅兵的舰艇旁边事故，随后在主管李泰检阅受阅部队。
en: It was reported that Putin congratulated the navy officers and soldiers on Navy Day, passed by the ships that were about to participate in the maritime parade in a small boat on the Gulf of Finland, and then inspected the troops under review at the main reviewing stand.

zh: 普京表示俄海军舰队列装了最新式的舰艇和特殊装备，装备水平不断提高。
en: Putin said that the Russian naval fleet was equipped with the latest ships and special equipment, and the level of equipment was constantly improving.

zh: 普京在俄罗斯海军日的阅兵式上说，俄罗斯海军舰队拥有配备了高级武器的军舰战略潜水巡洋舰和多用途潜艇，最新式飞机等飞行器独特的武器和特殊装备。
en: Putin said at the military parade on Russia’s Navy Day, "The Russian naval fleet is equipped with high-precision weapons, strategic submersible cruisers and multi-purpose submarines, the latest aircraft and other aircraft, unique weapons, and special equipment. ”

zh: 当地时间6月24日俄罗斯纪念卫国战争胜利75周年红场阅兵式举行。
en: On June 24 (MST), a military parade was held at Red Square in Russia to commemorate the 75th anniversary of the victory in the Great Patriotic War.

zh: 他还表示俄海军舰队将靠数字化和有效防御手段来取得独特优势。
en: He also stated that the Russian naval fleet will rely on digitalization and effective defense methods to gain unique advantages.

zh: 报道称，庆祝俄罗斯海军日的主要海军阅兵式在圣彼得堡和喀琅施塔德举行，共有46艘舰艇参加，包括卡萨托诺夫上将后护卫舰海军中将库拉科夫号大型反潜舰，以及大型登陆舰，小型导弹舰，护卫舰，前厅的。
en: According to the report, the main naval parade to celebrate Russia’s Navy Day was held in St. Petersburg and Kronshtadt, and a total of 46 ships participated, including the frigate "Admiral Kasatonov Frigate", the anti-submarine ship "Vice Admiral Kulakov", as well as large landing ships, small missile ships, frigates, submarines, and more.

zh: 其中系列舰艇在圣彼得堡冬宫桥旁进行静态展示，其中最引人注目的是，经过复制的是把世纪初俄罗斯搜索战列舰波尔塔瓦号。
en: Among them, the series of ships were statically displayed next to the Palace Bridge (Dvortsovyy Most) in St. Petersburg, the most eye-catching of which was the replica of Russia’s first battleship "Poltava" in the early 18th century.

zh: 为避免新冠病毒传播，今年海军阅兵式期间，只有当地居民和特邀来宾能够进入，卡拉是他的。
en: In order to avoid the spread of COVID-19, only local residents and special guests could enter Kronshtadt during the naval parade this year.

zh: 每年7月最后一个星期日是俄罗斯海军日。
en: Russia’s Navy Day takes place each year on the last Sunday of July.

zh: 北京爱乐合唱团创始人杨鸿年逝世，享年86岁中新网。
en: Yang Hongnian, Beijing Philharmonic Chorus, passes away at age 86 - chinanews.com

zh: 新京报讯记者，7月26日，北京爱乐合唱团发表布告，北京爱乐合唱团创始人中国著名指挥家，音乐教育家，中央音乐学院终身学术委员指挥，系教授，杨鸿年因病医治无效，于2020年7月26日，13:55在北京逝世，享年86岁。
en: Beijing News (Reporter Liu Zhen) On July 26, the Beijing Philharmonic Chorus published an obituary for its founder Yang Hongnian, who passed away in Beijing at 13:55 on July 26, 2020 at the age of 86, due to an ineffective medical treatment; he was a notable Chinese conductor and music educator, a lifetime academy scholar at the Central Conservatory of Music, and Composition Department professor.

zh: 图片来自北京爱乐合唱团官网。
en: Image from the Beijing Philharmonic Chorus official website.

zh: 杨鸿年出生于1934年，江苏南京人自幼酷爱音乐。
en: He was born in 1934 in Nanjing, Jiangsu, and even in childhood was a lover of music.
